trans-unit.source: See the install(DIRECTORY) command for documentation of permissions, FILES_MATCHING, PATTERN, REGEX, and EXCLUDE options. Copying directories preserves the structure of their content even if options are used to select a subset of files.

trans-unit.source: See the CMAKE_XCODE_ATTRIBUTE_<an-attribute> variable to set attributes on all targets in a directory tree.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 CMAKE_XCODE_ATTRIBUTE_<an-attribute> 变量以在目录树中的所有目标上设置属性。

trans-unit.source: See the DEPENDS option of add_custom_target() and add_custom_command() commands for adding file-level dependencies in custom rules. See the OBJECT_DEPENDS source file property to add file-level dependencies to object files.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 add_custom_target() 和 add_custom_command() 命令的 DEPENDS 选项，以在自定义规则中添加文件级依赖项。请参阅 OBJECT_DEPENDS 源文件属性，以将文件级依赖项添加到目标文件。

trans-unit.source: See the XCODE_ATTRIBUTE_<an-attribute> target property to set attributes on a specific target.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 XCODE_ATTRIBUTE_<an-attribute> 目标属性以在特定目标上设置属性。

trans-unit.source: See the counterpart property RULE_MESSAGES to disable everything except for target completion messages.

trans-unit.target: 选择CUDA运行时库,供针对CUDA语言的编译器使用。

trans-unit.source: Select the CUDA runtime library for use when compiling and linking CUDA. This variable is used to initialize the CUDA_RUNTIME_LIBRARY property on all targets as they are created.
trans-unit.target: 选择在编译和链接CUDA时使用的CUDA运行时库。此变量用于在创建所有目标时初始化它们的 CUDA_RUNTIME_LIBRARY 属性。

trans-unit.source: Select the MSVC runtime library for use by compilers targeting the MSVC ABI.
trans-unit.target: 选择MSVC运行时库,供针对MSVC ABI的编译器使用。

trans-unit.source: Select the MSVC runtime library for use by compilers targeting the MSVC ABI. This variable is used to initialize the MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY property on all targets as they are created. It is also propagated by calls to the try_compile() command into the test project.
trans-unit.target: 选择MSVC运行时库，以供面向MSVC ABI的编译器使用。该变量用于在创建所有目标时初始化它们的 MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY 属性。也可以通过调用 try_compile() 命令将其传播到测试项目中。

Selects the behavior of the module. This is a boolean variable:
trans-unit.target: 选择模块的行为。这是一个布尔变量。

trans-unit.source: Selects which programming languages are needed to build the project. Supported languages include C, CXX (i.e. C++), CUDA, Fortran, and ASM. By default C and CXX are enabled if no language options are given. Specify language NONE, or use the LANGUAGES keyword and list no languages, to skip enabling any languages.
trans-unit.target: 选择构建项目所需的编程语言。支持的语言包括 C ， CXX （即C ++）， CUDA ， Fortran 和 ASM 。如果没有给出语言选项，默认情况下启用 C 和 CXX 。指定语言 NONE ，或使用 LANGUAGES 关键字并且不列出任何语言，以跳过启用任何语言的操作。

trans-unit.source: Selects which programming languages are needed to build the project. Supported languages include C, CXX (i.e. C++), CUDA, OBJC (i.e. Objective-C), OBJCXX, Fortran, ISPC, and ASM. By default C and CXX are enabled if no language options are given. Specify language NONE, or use the LANGUAGES keyword and list no languages, to skip enabling any languages.
trans-unit.target: 选择构建项目所需的编程语言。支持的语言包括 C ， CXX （即C ++）， CUDA ， OBJC （即Objective-C）， OBJCXX ， Fortran ， ISPC 和 ASM 。如果没有给出语言选项，默认情况下启用 C 和 CXX 。指定语言 NONE ，或使用 LANGUAGES 关键字并且不列出任何语言，以跳过启用任何语言的过程。

trans-unit.source: Semantic information about the CMake buildsystem itself.
trans-unit.target: 关于CMake构建系统本身的语义信息。

trans-unit.target: Server

trans-unit.source: Set CMAKE_DEBUG_POSTFIX near the beginning of the top-level CMakeLists.txt file:
trans-unit.target: 在顶级 CMakeLists.txt 文件的开头附近设置 CMAKE_DEBUG_POSTFIX ：

trans-unit.source: Set <output> variable with details about any error.
trans-unit.target: 设置 <output> 变量，其中包含有关任何错误的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Set <result> variable to YES if IPO is supported by the compiler and NO otherwise. If this option is not given then the command will issue a fatal error if IPO is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 如果编译器支持IPO ，则将 <result> 变量设置为 YES ,否则设置为 NO 。如果未提供此选项，那么如果不支持IPO，则该命令将发出致命错误。

trans-unit.source: Set Boost_NO_BOOST_CMAKE to ON, to disable the search for boost-cmake.
trans-unit.target: 将 Boost_NO_BOOST_CMAKE 设置为 ON ，以禁用对boost-cmake的搜索。

trans-unit.source: Set CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_PREFER_CONFIG to TRUE to tell find_package() to first search using Config mode before falling back to Module mode.
trans-unit.target: 将 CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_PREFER_CONFIG 设置为 TRUE ,以告诉 find_package() 首先使用Config模式进行搜索，然后再返回到Module模式。

trans-unit.source: Set CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_WARN_NO_MODULE to TRUE to tell find_package() to warn when it implicitly assumes Config mode. This helps developers enforce use of an explicit mode in all calls to find_package() within a project.
trans-unit.target: 将 CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_WARN_NO_MODULE 设置为 TRUE ,以指示 find_package() 在隐式假定为Config模式时发出警告。这有助于开发人员在对的所有调用中强制使用显式模式 find_package() 在项目中 find_package（）的。

trans-unit.source: Set CUPS_REQUIRE_IPP_DELETE_ATTRIBUTE to TRUE if you need a version which features this function (i.e. at least 1.1.19)
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要具有此功能的版本， CUPS_REQUIRE_IPP_DELETE_ATTRIBUTE 设置为 TRUE 。 1.1.19 ）

trans-unit.source: Set CURL_NO_CURL_CMAKE to ON to disable this search.
trans-unit.target: 将 CURL_NO_CURL_CMAKE 设置为 ON 可禁用此搜索。

trans-unit.source: Set CURSES_NEED_NCURSES to TRUE before the find_package(Curses) call if NCurses functionality is required.

Set CURSES_NEED_NCURSES to TRUE before the find_package(Curses) call if NCurses functionality is required. Set CURSES_NEED_WIDE to TRUE before the find_package(Curses) call if unicode functionality is required.
trans-unit.target: 设置 CURSES_NEED_NCURSES 到 TRUE 的前 find_package(Curses) 调用如果需要ncurses的功能。将 CURSES_NEED_WIDE 设置为 TRUE ,然后 find_package(Curses) 调用如果需要的Unicode功能。

trans-unit.source: Set GDAL_DIR or GDAL_ROOT in the environment to specify the GDAL installation prefix.
trans-unit.target: 设置 GDAL_DIR 或 GDAL_ROOT 在环境中以指定GDAL安装前缀。

trans-unit.source: Set GSL_ROOT_DIR to a directory that contains a GSL installation.
trans-unit.target: 设置 GSL_ROOT_DIR 为包含GSL安装的目录。

trans-unit.source: Set MKLROOT environment variable to a directory that contains an MKL installation.
trans-unit.target: 设置 MKLROOT 环境变量为包含MKL安装的目录。

trans-unit.source: Set OPENSSL_ROOT_DIR to the root directory of an OpenSSL installation.

Set OPENSSL_ROOT_DIR to the root directory of an OpenSSL installation. Set OPENSSL_USE_STATIC_LIBS to TRUE to look for static libraries. Set OPENSSL_MSVC_STATIC_RT set TRUE to choose the MT version of the lib.
trans-unit.target: 将 OPENSSL_ROOT_DIR 设置为OpenSSL安装的根目录。将 OPENSSL_USE_STATIC_LIBS 设置为 TRUE ,以查找静态库。将 OPENSSL_MSVC_STATIC_RT 设置为 TRUE ,以选择库的MT版本。

trans-unit.source: Set true to get extra debugging output.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 true 可获得更多调试输出。

trans-unit.source: Set true to skip trying to find hdf5-config.cmake.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 true 可以跳过尝试查找 hdf5-config.cmake 的过程。

trans-unit.target: 设置缓存条目

trans-unit.target: 设置环境变量

trans-unit.target: 设置正常变量

trans-unit.target: 直接设置Xcode目标属性。

trans-unit.target: 设置一个CPack变量。这将覆盖 cpack 读取的输入文件中为 <var> 设置的任何值。

trans-unit.source: Set a named property in a given scope.
trans-unit.target: 在给定的作用域中设置一个命名的属性。

trans-unit.source: Set a normal, cache, or environment variable to a given value. See the cmake-language(7) variables documentation for the scopes and interaction of normal variables and cache entries.
trans-unit.target: 将普通变量，缓存变量或环境变量设置为给定值。参见cmake-language（7）变量正常变量和缓存条目的范围和交互作用，文档。

trans-unit.source: Set a property of the tests.
trans-unit.target: 设置测试的一个属性。

trans-unit.source: Set a real time of day at which all tests should timeout. Example: 7:00:00 -0400. Any time format understood by the curl date parser is accepted. Local time is assumed if no timezone is specified.
trans-unit.target: 设置所有测试应超时的实时时间。例如：7： 7:00:00 -0400 ：00 -0400。接受卷曲日期解析器理解的任何时间格式。如果未指定时区，则假定为本地时间。

trans-unit.source: Set a time at which all tests should stop running.
trans-unit.target: 设置所有测试停止运行的时间。

trans-unit.target: 设置 .hlsl 源文件的其他Visual Studio着色器标志。

trans-unit.source: Set an element in <json-string> at the location given by the list of <member|index> arguments to <value>. The contents of <value> should be valid JSON.
trans-unit.target: 将 <json-string> 中的元素设置为 <value> 的 <member|index> 参数列表所指定的位置。 <value> 的内容应为有效的JSON。

trans-unit.target: 设置非构建文件上的任何项目元数据。

trans-unit.source: Set any item metadata on all non-built files that use <tool>.
trans-unit.target: 在所有使用<tool>的非构建文件上设置任何项目元数据。

trans-unit.target: 为包含 .hlsl 源文件的目标代码的输出头文件设置文件名。

trans-unit.source: Set if shared libraries may be named like archives.
trans-unit.target: 设置共享图书馆是否可以像档案馆一样命名。

trans-unit.target: 在包含 .hlsl 源文件的目标代码的头文件中设置变量的名称。

trans-unit.target: 设置 Ninja 生成器的输出文件路径前缀。

Set properties of the current directory and subdirectories.
trans-unit.target: 设置当前目录和子目录的属性。

trans-unit.source: Set the WORKING_DIRECTORY test property to specify the working directory in which to execute the test. If not specified the test will be run with the current working directory set to the build directory corresponding to the current source directory.
trans-unit.target: 设置 WORKING_DIRECTORY 测试属性以指定要在其中执行测试的工作目录。如果未指定，将在当前工作目录设置为与当前源目录相对应的构建目录的情况下运行测试。

trans-unit.source: Set the CMAKE_TRY_COMPILE_CONFIGURATION variable to choose a build configuration.
trans-unit.target: 设置 CMAKE_TRY_COMPILE_CONFIGURATION 变量以选择构建配置。

trans-unit.source: Set the CMAKE_TRY_COMPILE_PLATFORM_VARIABLES variable to specify variables that must be propagated into the test project. This variable is meant for use only in toolchain files and is only honored by the try_compile() command for the source files form, not when given a whole project.
trans-unit.target: 设置 CMAKE_TRY_COMPILE_PLATFORM_VARIABLES 变量以指定必须传播到测试项目中的变量。此变量仅在工具链文件中使用，并且仅对于源文件形式由 try_compile() 命令使用，而在给出整个项目时不适用。

trans-unit.source: Set the CMAKE_TRY_COMPILE_TARGET_TYPE variable to specify the type of target used for the source file signature.
trans-unit.target: 设置 CMAKE_TRY_COMPILE_TARGET_TYPE 变量以指定用于源文件签名的目标类型。

trans-unit.source: Set the XcodeexplicitFileType attribute on its reference to a source file. CMake computes a default based on file extension but can be told explicitly with this property.
trans-unit.target: 设置 Xcode explicitFileType 其引用源文件的属性。CMake根据文件扩展名计算默认值，但可以使用此属性明确告知。

trans-unit.source: Set the XcodelastKnownFileType attribute on its reference to a source file. CMake computes a default based on file extension but can be told explicitly with this property.
trans-unit.target: 将 Xcode lastKnownFileType 属性设置为对源文件的引用。CMake根据文件扩展名计算默认值，但可以使用此属性明确告知。

trans-unit.source: Set the XcodeexplicitFileType attribute on its reference to a source file. CMake computes a default based on file extension but can be told explicitly with this property.
trans-unit.target: 设置 Xcode explicitFileType 其引用源文件的属性。CMake根据文件扩展名计算默认值，但可以使用此属性明确告知。

trans-unit.source: Set the XcodelastKnownFileType attribute on its reference to a source file. CMake computes a default based on file extension but can be told explicitly with this property.
trans-unit.target: 将 Xcode lastKnownFileType 属性设置为对源文件的引用。CMake根据文件扩展名计算默认值，但可以使用此属性明确告知。

trans-unit.source: Set the XcodeexplicitFileType attribute on its reference to a source file. CMake computes a default based on file extension but can be told explicitly with this property.
Set the XcodelastKnownFileType attribute on its reference to a source file. CMake computes a default based on file extension but can be told explicitly with this property.
Set the CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH to where MathFunctions was installed previously and try again. Ensure that the newly created executable runs as expected.
trans-unit.target: 将 CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH 设置为先前安装MathFunctions的位置，然后重试。确保新创建的可执行文件按预期运行。

trans-unit.source: Set the MKLROOT environment variable to a directory that contains an MKL installation, or add the directory to the dynamic library loader environment variable for your platform (LIB, DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH or LD_LIBRARY_PATH).
trans-unit.target: 将 MKLROOT 环境变量设置为包含MKL安装的目录，或将目录添加到平台的动态库加载器环境变量（ LIB ， DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH 或 LD_LIBRARY_PATH ）。

trans-unit.source: Set the Android MIN API version (e.g. 9). The version number must be a positive decimal integer. This property is initialized by the value of the CMAKE_ANDROID_API_MIN variable if it is set when a target is created. Native code builds using this API version.
trans-unit.target: 设置Android MIN API版本（例如 9 ）。版本号必须为正的十进制整数。如果在创建目标时设置了此属性，则该属性由 CMAKE_ANDROID_API_MIN 变量的值初始化。使用此API版本构建本机代码。

trans-unit.source: Set the Android assets directories to copy into the main assets folder before build. This a string property that contains the directory paths separated by semicolon. This property is initialized by the value of the CMAKE_ANDROID_ASSETS_DIRECTORIES variable if it is set when a target is created.
trans-unit.target: 设置Android资产目录以在构建之前将其复制到主资产文件夹中。此字符串属性，包含用分号分隔的目录路径。如果在创建目标时设置了此属性，则该属性由 CMAKE_ANDROID_ASSETS_DIRECTORIES 变量的值初始化。

trans-unit.source: Set the Android property that defines the Java source code root directories. This a string property that contains the directory paths separated by semicolon. This property is initialized by the value of the CMAKE_ANDROID_JAVA_SOURCE_DIR variable if it is set when a target is created.
trans-unit.target: 设置定义Java源代码根目录的Android属性。此字符串属性，包含用分号分隔的目录路径。如果在创建目标时设置了此属性，则通过 CMAKE_ANDROID_JAVA_SOURCE_DIR 变量的值来初始化此属性。

trans-unit.source: Set the Android property that defines the maximum number of a parallel Android NDK compiler processes (e.g. 4). This property is initialized by the value of the CMAKE_ANDROID_PROCESS_MAX variable if it is set when a target is created.
trans-unit.target: 设置Android属性，该属性定义并行Android NDK编译器进程的最大数量（例如 4 ）。如果在创建目标时设置了此属性，则通过 CMAKE_ANDROID_PROCESS_MAX 变量的值来初始化此属性。

trans-unit.source: Set the Android property that defines whether or not to skip the Ant build step. This is a boolean property initialized by the value of the CMAKE_ANDROID_SKIP_ANT_STEP variable if it is set when a target is created.
trans-unit.target: 设置Android属性，该属性定义是否跳过Ant构建步骤。如果是在创建目标时设置的，则此属性是由 CMAKE_ANDROID_SKIP_ANT_STEP 变量的值初始化的布尔属性。

trans-unit.source: Set the Android property that specifies JAR dependencies. This is a string value property. This property is initialized by the value of the CMAKE_ANDROID_JAR_DEPENDENCIES variable if it is set when a target is created.
trans-unit.target: 设置用于指定JAR依赖项的Android属性。这是一个字符串值属性。如果在创建目标时设置了此属性，则该属性将由 CMAKE_ANDROID_JAR_DEPENDENCIES 变量的值初始化。

trans-unit.source: Set the Android property that specifies directories to search for the .so libraries.
trans-unit.target: 设置用于指定目录以搜索 .so 库的Android属性。

trans-unit.source: Set the Android property that specifies directories to search for the JAR libraries.
trans-unit.target: 设置Android属性,指定搜索JAR库的目录。

trans-unit.source: Set the Android property that specifies the .so dependencies. This is a string property.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定.so依赖关系的Android属性。这是一个字符串属性。

trans-unit.source: Set the Android property that specifies the location of the ProGuard config file. Leave empty to use the default one. This a string property that contains the path to ProGuard config file. This property is initialized by the value of the CMAKE_ANDROID_PROGUARD_CONFIG_PATH variable if it is set when a target is created.
trans-unit.target: 设置用于指定ProGuard配置文件位置的Android属性。保留空白以使用默认值。此字符串属性，包含ProGuard配置文件的路径。如果在创建目标时设置了此属性，则通过 CMAKE_ANDROID_PROGUARD_CONFIG_PATH 变量的值来初始化此属性。

trans-unit.source: Set the Android property that states the location of the secure properties file. This is a string property that contains the file path. This property is initialized by the value of the CMAKE_ANDROID_SECURE_PROPS_PATH variable if it is set when a target is created.
trans-unit.target: 设置指出安全属性文件位置的Android属性。这是一个字符串属性，包含文件路径。如果在创建目标时设置了此属性，则通过 CMAKE_ANDROID_SECURE_PROPS_PATH 变量的值来初始化此属性。

trans-unit.source: Set the Manifest Tool -> Input and Output -> DPI Awareness in the Visual Studio target project properties.
trans-unit.target: 在Visual Studio目标项目属性中设置清单工具->输入和输出-> DPI意识。

trans-unit.source: Set the RULE_LAUNCH_* global properties when CTEST_USE_LAUNCHERS is on.
trans-unit.target: 当CTEST_USE_LAUNCHERS开启时,设置RULE_LAUNCH_*全局属性。

trans-unit.source: Set the Visual Studio shader type of a .hlsl source file.
trans-unit.target: 设置 .hlsl 源文件的Visual Studio着色器类型。

trans-unit.source: Set the WinCE project AdditionalFiles in DeploymentTool in .vcproj files generated by the Visual Studio 9 2008 generator. This is useful when you want to debug on remote WinCE device. Specify additional files that will be copied to the device. For example:
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Studio 9 2008 生成器生成的 .vcproj 文件中的 DeploymentTool 中设置WinCE项目 AdditionalFiles 。当您想在远程WinCE设备上进行调试时，这很有用。指定将复制到设备的其他文件。例如：

trans-unit.source: Set the WinCE project AdditionalFiles in DeploymentTool in .vcproj files generated by the Visual Studio 9 2008 generator. This is useful when you want to debug on remote WinCE device. Specify additional files that will be copied to the device. For example:
trans-unit.target: 在 DeploymentTool 中的 Visual Studio 9 2008 生成器生成的 .vcproj 文件中设置WinCE项目 AdditionalFiles 。当您想在远程WinCE设备上进行调试时，这很有用。指定将复制到设备的其他文件。例如：

trans-unit.source: Set the WinCE project AdditionalFiles in DeploymentTool in .vcproj files generated by the Visual Studio 9 2008 generator. This is useful when you want to debug on remote WinCE device. Specify additional files that will be copied to the device. For example:

Set the WinCE project RemoteDirectory in DeploymentTool and RemoteExecutable in DebuggerTool in .vcproj files generated by the Visual Studio 9 2008 generator. This is useful when you want to debug on remote WinCE device. For example:
trans-unit.target: 设置在WinCE项目 RemoteDirectory 中 DeploymentTool 和 RemoteExecutable 在 DebuggerTool 中 .vcproj 由生成的文件 Visual Studio 9 2008 发电机。当您想在远程WinCE设备上进行调试时，这很有用。例如：

trans-unit.source: Set the WinCE project RemoteDirectory in DeploymentTool and RemoteExecutable in DebuggerTool in .vcproj files generated by the Visual Studio 9 2008 generator. This is useful when you want to debug on remote WinCE device. For example:
trans-unit.target: 设置在WinCE项目 RemoteDirectory 中 DeploymentTool 和 RemoteExecutable 在 DebuggerTool 中 .vcproj 由生成的文件 Visual Studio 9 2008 发电机。当您想在远程WinCE设备上进行调试时，这很有用。例如：

trans-unit.source: Set the WinCE project RemoteDirectory in DeploymentTool and RemoteExecutable in DebuggerTool in .vcproj files generated by the Visual Studio 9 2008 generator. This is useful when you want to debug on remote WinCE device. For example:
Set the Xcode explicitFileType attribute on its reference to a target. CMake computes a default based on target type but can be told explicitly with this property.
trans-unit.target: 设置Xcode的 explicitFileType 其参考对象属性。CMake根据目标类型计算默认值，但可以使用此属性明确告知。

trans-unit.source: Set the Xcode productType attribute on its reference to a target. CMake computes a default based on target type but can be told explicitly with this property.
trans-unit.target: 将Xcode productType 属性设置为其对目标的引用。CMake根据目标类型计算默认值，但可以使用此属性明确告知。

trans-unit.source: Set the additional options for Android Ant build system. This is a string value containing all command line options for the Ant build. This property is initialized by the value of the CMAKE_ANDROID_ANT_ADDITIONAL_OPTIONS variable if it is set when a target is created.
trans-unit.target: 设置Android Ant构建系统的其他选项。这是一个字符串值，其中包含Ant构建的所有命令行选项。如果在创建目标时设置了此属性，则该属性由 CMAKE_ANDROID_ANT_ADDITIONAL_OPTIONS 变量的值初始化。

trans-unit.source: Set the binary directory. If not specified, the value of CTEST_BINARY_DIRECTORY is used instead.
trans-unit.target: 设置二进制目录。如果未指定，则使用 CTEST_BINARY_DIRECTORY 的值。

trans-unit.source: Set the dashboard model. Must be one of Experimental, Continuous, or Nightly. This parameter is required unless APPEND is specified.
trans-unit.target: 设置仪表板模型。必须是“ Experimental ，“ Continuous ”或“ Nightly 。除非指定 APPEND ,否则此参数是必需的。

trans-unit.source: Set the default test timeout.
trans-unit.target: 设置默认的测试超时。

trans-unit.source: Set the folder name. Use to organize targets in an IDE.
trans-unit.target: 设置文件夹名称。用来组织IDE中的目标。

trans-unit.source: Set the given variable absvar to the absolute path contained within the variable var. This is to allow the computation of an absolute path, accounting for all the special cases documented above. While this macro is used to compute the various CMAKE_INSTALL_FULL_<dir> variables, it is exposed publicly to allow users who create additional path variables to also compute absolute paths where necessary, using the same logic.
trans-unit.target: 将给定变量 absvar 设置为变量 var 中包含的绝对路径。考虑到上面记录的所有特殊情况，这是为了允许计算绝对路径。虽然此宏用于计算各种 CMAKE_INSTALL_FULL_<dir> 变量，但它是公开公开的，以允许创建其他路径变量的用户也可以使用相同的逻辑在必要时计算绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: Set the given variable absvar to the absolute path contained within the variable var. This is to allow the computation of an absolute path, accounting for all the special cases documented above. While this macro is used to compute the various CMAKE_INSTALL_FULL_<dir> variables, it is exposed publicly to allow users who create additional path variables to also compute absolute paths where necessary, using the same logic. dirname is the directory name to get, e.g. BINDIR.
Set the given variable to the name of the computer.
trans-unit.target: 将给定的变量设置为计算机的名称。

trans-unit.source: Set the host compiler to be used by nvcc. Ignored if -ccbin or --compiler-bindir is already present in the CUDA_NVCC_FLAGS or CUDA_NVCC_FLAGS_<CONFIG> variables. For Visual Studio targets, the host compiler is constructed with one or more visual studio macros such as $(VCInstallDir), that expands out to the path when the command is run from within VS.
Set the interactive mode to 0 or 1.
trans-unit.target: 将交互模式设置为 0 或 1 。

trans-unit.source: Set the log level.
trans-unit.target: 设置日志级别。

trans-unit.source: Set the max width for a test name to output.
trans-unit.target: 设置要输出的测试名称的最大宽度。

trans-unit.source: Set the maximum width for each test name to show in the output. This allows the user to widen the output to avoid clipping the test name which can be very annoying.
trans-unit.target: 设置每个测试名称在输出中显示的最大宽度。这允许用户扩大输出,以避免剪切测试名称,这可能是非常恼人的。

trans-unit.source: Set the name of the project.
trans-unit.target: 设置项目的名称。

trans-unit.source: Set the permissions for the <files>... and <directories>... specified. Valid permissions are OWNER_READ, OWNER_WRITE, OWNER_EXECUTE, GROUP_READ, GROUP_WRITE, GROUP_EXECUTE, WORLD_READ, WORLD_WRITE, WORLD_EXECUTE, SETUID, SETGID.

Set the permissions for the <files>... and <directories>... specified. Valid permissions are OWNER_READ, OWNER_WRITE, OWNER_EXECUTE, GROUP_READ, GROUP_WRITE, GROUP_EXECUTE, WORLD_READ, WORLD_WRITE, WORLD_EXECUTE.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定的 <files>... 和 <directories>... 的权限。有效权限是 OWNER_READ ， OWNER_WRITE ， OWNER_EXECUTE ， GROUP_READ ， GROUP_WRITE ， GROUP_EXECUTE ， WORLD_READ ， WORLD_WRITE ， WORLD_EXECUTE 。

trans-unit.source: Set the regular expression used for dependency checking.
trans-unit.target: 设置用于依赖性检查的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: Set the respective value. This will result in an error for generators that do not support the respective field.
trans-unit.target: 设置相应的值。对于不支持相关字段的生成器,这将导致错误。

trans-unit.source: Set the source directory. If not specified, the value of CTEST_SOURCE_DIRECTORY is used instead.
trans-unit.target: 设置源目录。如果未指定，则使用 CTEST_SOURCE_DIRECTORY 的值。

trans-unit.source: Set this directory property to a true value on a subdirectory to exclude its targets from the "all" target of its ancestors. If excluded, running e.g. make in the parent directory will not build targets the subdirectory by default. This does not affect the "all" target of the subdirectory itself. Running e.g. make inside the subdirectory will still build its targets.

Set this directory property to a true value on a subdirectory to exclude its targets from the “all” target of its ancestors. If excluded, running e.g. make in the parent directory will not build targets the subdirectory by default. This does not affect the “all” target of the subdirectory itself. Running e.g. make inside the subdirectory will still build its targets.
trans-unit.target: 在子目录上将此目录属性设置为true值，以将其目标从其祖先的“所有”目标中排除。如果排除，则默认情况下在父目录中运行例如 make 不会构建目标子目录。这不会影响子目录本身的“所有”目标。在子目录中运行例如 make 仍将建立其目标。

trans-unit.source: Set this environment variable to a directory that contains an MKL installation, or add the directory to the dynamic library loader environment variable for your platform (LIB, DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH or LD_LIBRARY_PATH).
Set this property to a list of files that will be encoded and submitted to the dashboard as an addition to the test result.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性设置为将被编码并作为测试结果的补充提交到仪表板的文件列表。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to true for an imported shared library file that has no soname field. CMake may adjust generated link commands for some platforms to prevent the linker from using the path to the library in place of its missing soname. Ignored for non-imported targets.
trans-unit.target: 对于没有 soname 字段的导入的共享库文件，将此属性设置为true 。CMake可能会为某些平台调整生成的链接命令，以防止链接器使用库路径代替丢失的 soname 。忽略未导入的目标。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to true to tell CMake generators not to add file-level dependencies on the shared library files linked by this target. Modification to the shared libraries will not be sufficient to re-link this target. Logical target-level dependencies will not be affected so the linked shared libraries will still be brought up to date before this target is built.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性设置为true,告诉CMake生成器不要在此目标链接的共享库文件上添加文件级依赖。对共享库的修改将不足以重新链接这个目标。逻辑上的目标级依赖不会受到影响,所以链接的共享库仍然会在这个目标被构建之前被更新。

trans-unit.source: Set this target property to a true (or false) value to exclude (or include) the target from the "all" target of the containing directory and its ancestors. If excluded, running e.g. make in the containing directory or its ancestors will not build the target by default.

Set this target property to a true (or false) value to exclude (or include) the target from the “all” target of the containing directory and its ancestors. If excluded, running e.g. make in the containing directory or its ancestors will not build the target by default.
trans-unit.target: 将此目标属性设置为true（或false）值，以将目标从包含目录及其祖先的“所有”目标中排除（或包括）。如果排除，则默认情况下在包含目录或其祖先中运行例如 make 不会构建目标。

trans-unit.source: Set this to FALSE to exclude depender graphs foo.dot.<target>.dependers.
trans-unit.target: 将此设置为FALSE以排除依赖图 foo.dot.<target>.dependers 。

trans-unit.source: Set this to FALSE to exclude executables from the generated graphs.
trans-unit.target: 设置为FALSE,从生成的图形中排除可执行文件。

trans-unit.source: Set this to FALSE to exclude external libraries from the generated graphs.
trans-unit.target: 设置为FALSE,从生成的图形中排除外部库。

trans-unit.source: Set this to FALSE to exclude module libraries from the generated graphs.
trans-unit.target: 设置为FALSE,从生成的图形中排除模块库。

trans-unit.source: Set this to FALSE to exclude per target graphs foo.dot.<target>.
trans-unit.target: 将此设置为FALSE可排除每个目标图 foo.dot.<target> 。

trans-unit.source: Set this to FALSE to exclude shared libraries from the generated graphs.
trans-unit.target: 将此设置为FALSE,以从生成的图形中排除共享库。

trans-unit.source: Set this to FALSE to exclude static libraries from the generated graphs.
trans-unit.target: 设置为FALSE,从生成的图形中排除静态库。

trans-unit.source: Set this to a semicolon-separated list of command-line arguments to pass to ctest(1) when running tests through the test (or RUN_TESTS) target of the generated build system.
trans-unit.target: 通过生成的构建系统的 test （或 RUN_TESTS ）目标运行测试时， ctest(1) 设置为以分号分隔的命令行参数列表，以传递给ctest（1）。

trans-unit.source: Set this to a list of tests that must finish before this test is run. The results of those tests are not considered, the dependency relationship is purely for order of execution (i.e. it is really just a run after relationship). Consider using test fixtures with setup tests if a dependency with successful completion is required (see FIXTURES_REQUIRED).
trans-unit.target: 将此设置为必须运行的测试列表。不考虑这些测试的结果，依赖关系纯粹是按执行顺序进行的（即，它实际上只是一个追尾关系）。如果需要成功完成依赖项，请考虑将测试装置与设置测试一起使用（请参阅 FIXTURES_REQUIRED ）。

trans-unit.source: Set this to the soname embedded in an imported shared library. This is meaningful only on platforms supporting the feature. Ignored for non-imported targets.
trans-unit.target: 将此设置为嵌入在导入的共享库中的 soname 。这仅在支持该功能的平台上有意义。忽略未导入的目标。

trans-unit.source: Set this to the list of configuration names available for an IMPORTED target. The names correspond to configurations defined in the project from which the target is imported. If the importing project uses a different set of configurations the names may be mapped using the MAP_IMPORTED_CONFIG_<CONFIG> property. Ignored for non-imported targets.
trans-unit.target: 将此设置为可用于IMPORTED目标的配置名称列表。名称与导入目标的项目中定义的配置相对应。如果导入项目使用不同的配置集，则可以使用MAP_IMPORTED_CONFIG_ <CONFIG>属性来映射名称。忽略未导入的目标。

trans-unit.source: Set this to the list of configurations of an imported target that may be used for the current project’s <CONFIG> configuration. Targets imported from another project may not provide the same set of configuration names available in the current project. Setting this property tells CMake what imported configurations are suitable for use when building the <CONFIG> configuration. The first configuration in the list found to be provided by the imported target (i.e. via IMPORTED_LOCATION_<CONFIG> for the mapped-to <CONFIG>) is selected. As a special case, an empty list element refers to the configuration-less imported target location (i.e. IMPORTED_LOCATION).
trans-unit.target: 将此设置为可用于当前项目的 <CONFIG> 配置的导入目标的配置列表。从另一个项目导入的目标可能不提供当前项目中可用的同一套配置名称。设置此属性将告诉CMake在构建 <CONFIG> 配置时适合使用哪些导入的配置。选择列表中发现的第一个配置，该配置将由导入的目标提供（即，通过 IMPORTED_LOCATION_<CONFIG> 映射到 <CONFIG> ）。作为一种特殊情况，空列表元素是指无需配置的导入目标位置（即 IMPORTED_LOCATION ）。

trans-unit.source: Set this to the list of configurations of an imported target that may be used for the current project's <CONFIG> configuration. Targets imported from another project may not provide the same set of configuration names available in the current project. Setting this property tells CMake what imported configurations are suitable for use when building the <CONFIG> configuration. The first configuration in the list found to be provided by the imported target (i.e. via IMPORTED_LOCATION_<CONFIG> for the mapped-to <CONFIG>) is selected. As a special case, an empty list element refers to the configuration-less imported target location (i.e. IMPORTED_LOCATION).

Set this to the list of languages of source files compiled to produce a STATIC IMPORTED library (such as C or CXX). CMake accounts for these languages when computing how to link a target to the imported library. For example, when a C executable links to an imported C++ static library CMake chooses the C++ linker to satisfy language runtime dependencies of the static library.
trans-unit.target: 将此设置为已编译以生成 STATIC IMPORTED 库的源文件的语言列表（例如 C 或 CXX ）。 CMake在计算如何将目标链接到导入的库时会考虑这些语言。例如，当C可执行文件链接到导入的C ++静态库时，CMake选择C ++链接程序以满足静态库的语言运行时依赖性。

trans-unit.source: Set this to the list of libraries whose interface is included when an IMPORTED library target is linked to another target. The libraries will be included on the link line for the target. Unlike the LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES property, this property applies to all imported target types, including STATIC libraries. This property is ignored for non-imported targets.
trans-unit.target: 将此设置为将 IMPORTED 库目标链接到另一个目标时包含其接口的库列表。这些库将包含在目标的链接行中。与 LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES 属性不同，此属性适用于所有导入的目标类型，包括 STATIC 库。对于未导入的目标，将忽略此属性。

trans-unit.source: Set this to the location of an IMPORTED target file on disk. For executables this is the location of the executable file. For bundles on macOS this is the location of the executable file inside Contents/MacOS under the application bundle folder. For STATIC libraries and modules this is the location of the library or module. For SHARED libraries on non-DLL platforms this is the location of the shared library. For frameworks on macOS this is the location of the library file symlink just inside the framework folder. For DLLs this is the location of the .dll part of the library. For UNKNOWN libraries this is the location of the file to be linked. Ignored for non-imported targets.
trans-unit.target: 将此设置为磁盘上已 IMPORTED 目标文件的位置。对于可执行文件，这是可执行文件的位置。对于macOS上的捆绑软件，这是可执行文件在 Contents/MacOS 内部应用程序捆绑文件夹下的位置。对于 STATIC 库和模块，这是库或模块的位置。对于非DLL平台上的 SHARED 库，这是共享库的位置。对于macOS上的框架，这是库文件symlink的位置，位于框架文件夹内。对于DLL，这是该库 .dll 部分的位置。对于 UNKNOWN 库，这是要链接的文件的位置。忽略未导入的目标。

trans-unit.source: Set this to the location of the .lib part of a Windows DLL, or on AIX set it to an import file created for executables that export symbols (see the ENABLE_EXPORTS target property). Ignored for non-imported targets.
trans-unit.target: 将其设置为Windows DLL的 .lib 部分的位置，或在AIX上将其设置为为导出符号的可执行文件创建的导入文件（请参阅 ENABLE_EXPORTS 目标属性）。忽略未导入的目标。

trans-unit.source: Set this to the location of the .lib part of a Windows DLL. Ignored for non-imported targets.
trans-unit.target: 将此设置为Windows DLL 的 .lib 部分的位置。忽略未导入的目标。

trans-unit.source: Set this variable to change the build type if you are using a multi-config generator. For example, to install with the Debug configuration, run cmake -DBUILD_TYPE=Debug -P cmake_install.cmake.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用的是多配置生成器，请设置此变量以更改构建类型。例如，要使用 Debug 配置安装，请运行 cmake -DBUILD_TYPE=Debug -P cmake_install.cmake 。

trans-unit.source: Set this variable to install only a single CPack component as opposed to all of them. For example, if you only want to install the Development component, run cmake -DCOMPONENT=Development -P cmake_install.cmake.
trans-unit.target: 设置此变量以仅安装单个CPack组件，而不是所有组件。例如，如果只想安装 Development 组件，请运行 cmake -DCOMPONENT=Development -P cmake_install.cmake 。

trans-unit.source: Set to 1 or undefined: Legacy behavior is applied.
trans-unit.target: 设置为1或未定义。应用遗留行为。

trans-unit.source: Set to 2: A new strategy is applied regarding support files: the output directory of support files is erased before SWIG interface compilation.
trans-unit.target: 设置为2：对支持文件应用新策略：在编译 SWIG 接口之前，将删除支持文件的输出目录。

trans-unit.source: Set to CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR by this module. Note that if the project provides its own value for this and it is a relative path, it will be converted to an absolute path relative to the current binary directory. This is necessary because doxygen will normally be run from a directory within the source tree so that relative source paths work as expected. If this directory does not exist, it will be recursively created prior to executing the doxygen commands.
trans-unit.target: 通过此模块设置为 CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR 。请注意，如果项目为此提供了自己的值并且它是相对路径，则它将转换为相对于当前二进制目录的绝对路径。这是必需的，因为doxygen通常将从源树中的目录运行，以便相对的源路径按预期工作。如果该目录不存在，将在执行doxygen命令之前以递归方式创建它。

trans-unit.source: Set to 1 when the target system (CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME) is Android.
trans-unit.target: 当目标系统（ CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME ）为 Android 时设置为 1 。

trans-unit.source: Set to 1 when the target system (CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME) is iOS.
trans-unit.target: 当目标系统（ CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME ）为 iOS 时设置为 1 。

trans-unit.source: Set to Android. Must be specified to enable cross compiling for Android.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 Android 。必须指定以启用Android的交叉编译。

trans-unit.source: Set to FALSE: flags not to produce a position independent executable are passed to the linker step. For example -no-pie for GCC.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 FALSE ：不生成与位置无关的可执行文件的标志将传递到链接器步骤。例如 -no-pie 的 GCC 。

trans-unit.source: Set to FIXED or FREE to indicate the Fortran source layout.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 FIXED 或 FREE 表示Fortran源布局。

trans-unit.source: Set to NO by this module.
trans-unit.target: 通过该模块设置为“ NO 。

trans-unit.source: Set to OFF for C compilation of host code.
Set to ON for Emulation mode. -D_DEVICEEMU is defined for CUDA C files when CUDA_BUILD_EMULATION is TRUE.
Set to ON if you want the custom build rule to be attached to the source file in Visual Studio. Turn OFF if you add the same cuda file to multiple targets.
Set to ON or OFF to specify whether to search and use the debug libraries. Default is ON.
Set to ON or OFF to specify whether to search and use the release libraries. Default is ON.
Set to ON or OFF to specify whether to use libraries linked statically to the C++ runtime ("s" tag). Default is platform dependent.
Set to ON or OFF to specify whether to use libraries linked to the MS debug C++ runtime ("g" tag). Default is ON.

Set to ON to compile for 64 bit device code, OFF for 32 bit device code. Note that making this different from the host code when generating object or C files from CUDA code just won't work, because size_t gets defined by nvcc in the generated source. If you compile to PTX and then load the file yourself, you can mix bit sizes between device and host.
Set to ON to disable searching in locations not specified by these hint variables. Default is OFF.
Set to ON to enable and extra compilation pass with the -cubin option in Device mode. The output is parsed and register, shared memory usage is printed during build.
Set to ON to enable debug output from FindBoost. Please enable this before filing any bug report.

Set to ON to propagate CMAKE_{C,CXX}_FLAGS and their configuration dependent counterparts (e.g. CMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG) automatically to the host compiler through nvcc's -Xcompiler flag. This helps make the generated host code match the rest of the system better. Sometimes certain flags give nvcc problems, and this will help you turn the flag propagation off. This does not affect the flags supplied directly to nvcc via CUDA_NVCC_FLAGS or through the OPTION flags specified through cuda_add_library(), cuda_add_executable(), or cuda_wrap_srcs(). Flags used for shared library compilation are not affected by this flag.

Set to ON to resolve symlinks for discovered libraries to assist with packaging. For example, the "system" component library may be resolved to /usr/lib/libboost_system.so.1.67.0 instead of /usr/lib/libboost_system.so. This does not affect linking and should not be enabled unless the user needs this information.

Set to ON to see all the commands used when building the CUDA file. When using a Makefile generator the value defaults to VERBOSE (run make VERBOSE=1 to see output), although setting CUDA_VERBOSE_BUILD to ON will always print the output.
Set to ON to suppress the warning about unknown dependencies for new Boost versions.
Set to ON to use libraries compiled with STLPort ("p" tag). Default is OFF.
Set to ON to use libraries compiled with a debug Python build ("y" tag). Default is OFF.
Set to TRUE to tell find_package() calls to resolve symbolic links in the value of <PackageName>_DIR.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 TRUE 告诉 find_package() 调用解析 <PackageName>_DIR 值中的符号链接。

trans-unit.source: Set to TRUE: flags to produce a position independent executable are passed to the linker step. For example -pie for GCC.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 TRUE ：将生成位置独立可执行文件的标志传递到链接器步骤。例如， -pie 用于 GCC 。

trans-unit.source: Set to True when the target system is UNIX or UNIX-like (e.g. APPLE and CYGWIN). The CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME variable should be queried if a more specific understanding of the target system is required.
trans-unit.target: 当目标系统是UNIX或类似UNIX（例如 APPLE 和 CYGWIN ）时，设置为 True 。所述 CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME 如果需要一个更具体的理解目标系统的变量应被查询。

trans-unit.source: Set to a true value to ask CTest to launch the test process with CPU affinity for a fixed set of processors. If enabled and supported for the current platform, CTest will choose a set of processors to place in the CPU affinity mask when launching the test process. The number of processors in the set is determined by the PROCESSORS test property or the number of processors available to CTest, whichever is smaller. The set of processors chosen will be disjoint from the processors assigned to other concurrently running tests that also have the PROCESSOR_AFFINITY property enabled.
trans-unit.target: 设置为真值，以要求CTest以一组固定的处理器的CPU亲和性启动测试过程。如果为当前平台启用并受支持，则CTest将在启动测试过程时选择一组处理器放置在CPU亲和力掩码中。集合中的 PROCESSORS 数由PROCESSORS测试属性或CTest可用的处理器数确定，以较小者为准。所选的处理器集将与分配给其他同时运行的测试的处理器脱节，这些测试也具有 PROCESSOR_AFFINITY 启用 PROCESSOR_AFFINITY属性）。

trans-unit.source: Set to a true value to use the deprecated per-api-level headers instead of the unified headers. If not specified, the default will be false unless using a NDK that does not provide unified headers.
trans-unit.target: 设置为true,以使用废弃的per-api级头文件,而不是统一的头文件。如果没有指定,默认值为false,除非使用的NDK不提供统一的头文件。

An absolute path is a path that unambiguously identifies the location of a file without reference to an additional starting location. On Windows, this means the path must have both a root-name and a root-directory-separator to be considered absolute. On other platforms, just a root-directory-separator is sufficient. Note that this means on Windows, IS_ABSOLUTE can be false while HAS_ROOT_DIRECTORY can be true.

trans-unit.source: Sets the directories that should be passed to nvcc (e.g. nvcc -Ipath0 -Ipath1 ...). These paths usually contain other .cu files.
Sets the directory where the header files will be generated. Same behavior as option -d of javah tool. If not specified, CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR is used as the output directory.
trans-unit.target: 设置将在其中生成头文件的目录。与javah工具的 -d 选项相同。如果未指定，则 CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR 用作输出目录。

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified variable to a string representing the platform and compiler settings. These values are now available through the CMAKE_SYSTEM and CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER variables.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的变量设置为代表平台和编译器设置的字符串。这些值现在可通过 CMAKE_SYSTEM 和 CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER 变量获得。

trans-unit.source: Sets the target XML documentation file output.
trans-unit.target: 设置目标 XML 文档文件的输出。

trans-unit.source: Sets the user props file to be included in the visual studio C++ project file. The standard path is $(UserRootDir)\\Microsoft.Cpp.$(Platform).user.props, which is in most cases the same as %LOCALAPPDATA%\\Microsoft\\MSBuild\\v4.0\\Microsoft.Cpp.Win32.user.props or %LOCALAPPDATA%\\Microsoft\\MSBuild\\v4.0\\Microsoft.Cpp.x64.user.props.
trans-unit.target: 设置要包含在Visual Studio C ++项目文件中的用户props文件。标准路径是 $(UserRootDir)\\Microsoft.Cpp.$(Platform).user.props ，在大多数情况下，它与 %LOCALAPPDATA%\\Microsoft\\MSBuild\\v4.0\\Microsoft.Cpp.Win32.user.props 或 %LOCALAPPDATA%\\Microsoft\\MSBuild\\v4.0\\Microsoft.Cpp.x64.user.props 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the variable named ${var} to the number of physical cores available on the machine if the information can be determined. Otherwise it is set to 0. Currently this functionality is implemented for AIX, cygwin, FreeBSD, HPUX, Linux, macOS, QNX, Sun and Windows.
trans-unit.target: 将名为 ${var}的变量设置为机器上可用的物理核心数,如果能够确定该信息,则将其设置为 0。目前这个功能已经在AIX、cygwin、FreeBSD、HPUX、Linux、macOS、QNX、Sun和Windows中实现。

trans-unit.source: Sets the verbosity of AUTOMOC, AUTOUIC and AUTORCC. A positive integer value or a true boolean value lets the AUTO* generators output additional processing information.
trans-unit.target: 设置 AUTOMOC ， AUTOUIC 和 AUTORCC 的详细程度。正整数值或真布尔值可使 AUTO* 生成器输出其他处理信息。

trans-unit.source: Sets up an include guard for the current CMake file (see the CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_FILE variable documentation).
trans-unit.target: 为当前CMake文件设置一个包含保护（请参阅 CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_FILE 变量文档）。

trans-unit.source: Setting CMAKE_AUTOGEN_VERBOSE has the same effect as setting the VERBOSE environment variable during generation (e.g. by calling make VERBOSE=1). The extra verbosity is limited to the AUTO* generators though.
trans-unit.target: 设置 CMAKE_AUTOGEN_VERBOSE 与在生成过程中设置 VERBOSE 环境变量具有相同的效果（例如，通过调用 make VERBOSE=1 ）。不过，额外的详细信息仅限于 AUTO* 生成器。

trans-unit.source: Setting CMAKE_DOTNET_TARGET_FRAMEWORK may be necessary when working with C# and newer .NET framework versions to avoid referencing errors with the ALL_BUILD CMake target.
trans-unit.target: 使用 C# 和较新的.NET Framework版本时，可能需要设置 CMAKE_DOTNET_TARGET_FRAMEWORK ,以避免使用 ALL_BUILD CMake目标引用错误。

trans-unit.source: Setting CMAKE_DOTNET_TARGET_FRAMEWORK_VERSION may be necessary when working with C# and newer .NET framework versions to avoid referencing errors with the ALL_BUILD CMake target.
trans-unit.target: 使用 C# 和较新的.NET Framework版本时，可能需要设置 CMAKE_DOTNET_TARGET_FRAMEWORK_VERSION ,以避免使用 ALL_BUILD CMake目标引用错误。

trans-unit.target: 按CMake版本设置策略

trans-unit.target: 设置这样的属性会在解决方案文件中生成一个如下形式的条目。

trans-unit.target: 通过 xcode-select 命令行工具设置默认版本。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to true ensures the source file will be skipped by unity builds when its associated target has its UNITY_BUILD property set to true. The source file will instead be compiled on its own in the same way as it would with unity builds disabled.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性设置为true可确保当其关联目标的 UNITY_BUILD 属性设置为true时，源文件将被统一构建跳过。相反，源文件将以与禁用unity builds相同的方式自行编译。

trans-unit.source: Setting this to 0 prevents ctest(1) from being run again when it reaches the end of a script run by calling ctest -S.
trans-unit.target: 将此设置为0可以防止 ctest(1) 在到达通过调用 ctest -S 运行的脚本末尾时再次运行。

trans-unit.source: Setting this variable to true enables showing a context with each line logged by the message() command (see CMAKE_MESSAGE_CONTEXT for how the context itself is specified).
trans-unit.target: 将此变量设置为true可以显示由 message() 命令记录的每一行的上下文（有关如何指定上下文本身，请参阅 CMAKE_MESSAGE_CONTEXT ）。

trans-unit.source: Setting variables on the command line
trans-unit.target: 在命令行上设置变量

trans-unit.source: Setting variables with cmake-gui
trans-unit.target: 使用 cmake-gui 设置变量

trans-unit.source: Several variables relate to the language components of a toolchain which are enabled. CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER is the full path to the compiler used for <LANG>. CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID is the identifier used by CMake for the compiler and CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_VERSION is the version of the compiler.
trans-unit.target: 有几个变量与启用的工具链的语言组件相关。 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER 是用于 <LANG> 的编译器的完整路径。 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID 是CMake用于编译器的标识符，而 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_VERSION 是编译器的版本。

trans-unit.source: Shared libraries may be linked to other shared libraries as part of their implementation. On some platforms the linker searches for the dependent libraries of shared libraries they are including in the link. Set this property to the list of dependent shared libraries of an imported library. The list should be disjoint from the list of interface libraries in the INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES property. On platforms requiring dependent shared libraries to be found at link time CMake uses this list to add appropriate files or paths to the link command line. Ignored for non-imported targets.
trans-unit.target: 共享库可以链接到其他共享库，作为其实现的一部分。在某些平台上，链接器搜索它们包括在链接中的共享库的从属库。将此属性设置为导入库的依赖共享库的列表。该列表应与 INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES 属性中的接口库列表不相交。在要求在链接时找到依赖的共享库的平台上，CMake使用此列表向链接命令行添加适当的文件或路径。忽略未导入的目标。

trans-unit.source: Shared library targets marked with the FRAMEWORK property generate frameworks on macOS, iOS and normal shared libraries on other platforms. This property may be set to a list of header files to be placed in the Headers directory inside the framework folder. On non-Apple platforms these headers may be installed using the PUBLIC_HEADER option to the install(TARGETS) command.
trans-unit.target: 标有 FRAMEWORK 属性的共享库目标在macOS，iOS上生成框架，并在其他平台上生成普通共享库。可以将此属性设置为要放在框架文件夹内的 Headers 目录中的头文件列表。在非Apple平台上，可以使用 install(TARGETS) 命令的 PUBLIC_HEADER 选项安装这些标头。

trans-unit.source: Shared library targets marked with the FRAMEWORK property generate frameworks on macOS, iOS and normal shared libraries on other platforms. This property may be set to a list of header files to be placed in the PrivateHeaders directory inside the framework folder. On non-Apple platforms these headers may be installed using the PRIVATE_HEADER option to the install(TARGETS) command.
trans-unit.target: 标有 FRAMEWORK 属性的共享库目标在macOS，iOS上生成框架，并在其他平台上生成普通共享库。可以将此属性设置为要放在框架文件夹内的PrivateHeaders目录中的头文件列表。在非Apple平台上，可以使用 install(TARGETS) 命令的 PRIVATE_HEADER 选项安装这些标头。

trans-unit.source: Shared stateless query files allow clients to share requests for major versions of the Object Kinds and get all requested versions recognized by the CMake that runs.
trans-unit.target: 共享的无状态查询文件允许客户端共享对主要类型的对象种类的请求，并获取运行的CMake识别的所有请求版本。

trans-unit.source: Short description of the project (only a few words). If the CMAKE_PROJECT_DESCRIPTION variable is set, it is used as the default value, otherwise the default will be a string generated by CMake based on CMAKE_PROJECT_NAME.
trans-unit.target: 项目的简短描述（仅几个字）。如果设置了 CMAKE_PROJECT_DESCRIPTION 变量，则将其用作默认值，否则默认值为CMake基于 CMAKE_PROJECT_NAME 生成的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Short project description given to the project command.
trans-unit.target: 给予项目命令的简短项目描述。

trans-unit.source: Should be set by config-files in the case that it has set Xxx_FOUND to FALSE. The contained message will be printed by the find_package() command and by find_package_handle_standard_args() to inform the user about the problem.
trans-unit.target: 如果已将 Xxx_FOUND 设置为FALSE，则应由配置文件设置。包含的消息将通过 find_package() 命令和 find_package_handle_standard_args() 打印，以通知用户有关问题。

trans-unit.source: Should be set by config-files in the case that it has set Xxx_FOUND to FALSE. The contained message will be printed by the find_package() command and by find_package_handle_standard_args() to inform the user about the problem. Use this instead of calling message() directly to report a reason for failing to find the module or package.
Should rpaths be used for the build tree.
trans-unit.target: 是否应该将rpaths用于构建树。

trans-unit.source: Should the command be unable to obtain a timestamp the output variable will be set to the empty string “”.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令无法获得时间戳，则输出变量将设置为空字符串“”。

trans-unit.source: Should the target be processed with auto-moc (for Qt projects).
trans-unit.target: 目标是否应该用auto-moc处理(对于Qt项目)。

trans-unit.source: Should the target be processed with auto-rcc (for Qt projects).
trans-unit.target: 目标是否应该用auto-rcc处理(对于Qt项目)。

trans-unit.source: Should the target be processed with auto-uic (for Qt projects).
trans-unit.target: 目标是否应该用auto-uic处理(对于Qt项目)。

trans-unit.source: Show as JSON Object Model
trans-unit.target: 显示为JSON对象模型

trans-unit.source: Show debug messages.
trans-unit.target: 显示调试信息。

trans-unit.source: Show program name/version banner and exit.
trans-unit.target: 显示程序名称/版本横幅并退出。

trans-unit.source: Signatures of this command that specify a <value>... placeholder expect zero or more arguments. Multiple arguments will be joined as a semicolon-separated list to form the actual variable value to be set. Zero arguments will cause normal variables to be unset. See the unset() command to unset variables explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <value>... 占位符的此命令的签名期望零个或多个参数。多个参数将以分号分隔的列表形式连接，以形成要设置的实际变量值。零参数将导致未设置普通变量。请参阅 unset() 命令以显式取消设置变量。

trans-unit.source: Similar to $env{<variable-name>}, except that the value only comes from the parent environment, and never from the environment field. This allows you to prepend or append values to existing environment variables. For example, setting PATH to /path/to/ninja/bin:$penv{PATH} will prepend /path/to/ninja/bin to the PATH environment variable. This is needed because $env{<variable-name>} does not allow circular references.
trans-unit.target: 与 $env{<variable-name>} 相似，除了该值仅来自父环境，而不来自 environment 字段。这使您可以在现有环境变量之前或之后附加值。例如，将 PATH 设置为 /path/to/ninja/bin:$penv{PATH} 将 /path/to/ninja/bin 放在 PATH 环境变量之前。这是必需的，因为 $env{<variable-name>} 不允许循环引用。

trans-unit.source: Similar to NAMELINK_ONLY, but it has the opposite effect: it causes the installation of library files other than the namelink when a library target is installed. When neither NAMELINK_ONLY or NAMELINK_SKIP are given, both portions are installed. On platforms where versioned shared libraries do not have symlinks or when a library is not versioned, NAMELINK_SKIP installs the library. It is an error to use this parameter outside of a LIBRARY block.
trans-unit.target: 与 NAMELINK_ONLY 相似，但效果相反：安装库目标时，它会导致安装除名称链接之外的库文件。如果既未提供 NAMELINK_ONLY 也 NAMELINK_SKIP 提供NAMELINK_SKIP，则两个部分均已安装。在版本共享库没有符号链接或没有版本库的平台上， NAMELINK_SKIP 将安装该库。在 LIBRARY 块之外使用此参数是错误的。

trans-unit.source: Similar to PUBLIC_HEADER and PRIVATE_HEADER, but for RESOURCE files. See RESOURCE for details.
trans-unit.target: 与 PUBLIC_HEADER 和 PRIVATE_HEADER 类似，但用于 RESOURCE 文件。有关详细信息，请参见 RESOURCE 。

trans-unit.source: Similar to PUBLIC_HEADER, but for PRIVATE_HEADER files. See PRIVATE_HEADER for details.
trans-unit.target: 与 PUBLIC_HEADER 类似，但用于 PRIVATE_HEADER 文件。有关详细信息，请参见 PRIVATE_HEADER 。

trans-unit.source: Similar to TEST_PREFIX except the suffix is appended to the name of every discovered test case. Both TEST_PREFIX and TEST_SUFFIX may be specified.
trans-unit.target: 与 TEST_PREFIX 相似，不同之处在于在每个发现的测试用例的名称后都添加了 suffix 。无论 TEST_PREFIX 和 TEST_SUFFIX 可以指定。

trans-unit.source: Similar to Xxx_EXECUTABLE except here the Xxx is always the module name and YYY is the tool name (again, usually fully uppercase). Prefer this form if the tool name is not very widely known or has the potential to clash with another tool. For greater consistency, also prefer this form if the module provides more than one executable.

Similar to the target property PREFIX, but used for import libraries (typically corresponding to a DLL) instead of regular libraries. A target property that can be set to override the prefix (such as lib) on an import library name.
trans-unit.target: 与目标属性 PREFIX 相似，但是用于导入库（通常对应于 DLL ）而不是常规库。可以设置为覆盖导入库名称上的前缀（例如 lib ）的目标属性。

trans-unit.source: Similar to the target property SUFFIX, but used for import libraries (typically corresponding to a DLL) instead of regular libraries. A target property that can be set to override the suffix (such as .lib) on an import library name.
trans-unit.target: 与目标属性 SUFFIX 相似，但是用于导入库（通常对应于 DLL ）而不是常规库。可以设置目标属性以覆盖导入库名称上的后缀（例如 .lib ）。

trans-unit.source: Similar usage as CPACK_INCLUDE_TOPLEVEL_DIRECTORY but for the component case. See CPACK_INCLUDE_TOPLEVEL_DIRECTORY documentation for the detail.
trans-unit.target: 与 CPACK_INCLUDE_TOPLEVEL_DIRECTORY 相似，但用于组件情况。有关详细信息，请参见 CPACK_INCLUDE_TOPLEVEL_DIRECTORY 文档。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, some compilers do not ship their own supplementary utilities such as linkers, but provide a way to specify the location of the external toolchain which will be used by the compiler driver. The CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_EXTERNAL_TOOLCHAIN variable can be set in a toolchain file to pass the path to the compiler driver.
trans-unit.target: 同样，某些编译器不提供自己的补充实用程序（例如链接器），而是提供一种方法来指定编译器驱动程序将使用的外部工具链的位置。所述 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_EXTERNAL_TOOLCHAIN 变量可在工具链文件被设置为路径传递给编译器。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the COMPATIBLE_INTERFACE_NUMBER_MIN may be used to calculate the numeric minimum value for a property from dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 同样， COMPATIBLE_INTERFACE_NUMBER_MIN 可用于根据依赖关系计算属性的数字最小值。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the MODULE keyword says to use only a find-module:
trans-unit.target: 同样， MODULE 关键字表示仅使用查找模块：

trans-unit.target: 简化变量引用和转义序列评估。

trans-unit.target: 模拟器SDK

trans-unit.target: 由于 ARGN ， ARGC ， ARGV ， ARGV0 等不变量，你将无法使用命令状

trans-unit.source: Since CMAKE_CUDA_HOST_COMPILER is meaningful only when the CMAKE_CUDA_COMPILER_ID is NVIDIA, it does not make sense to set CMAKE_CUDA_HOST_COMPILER without also setting CMAKE_CUDA_COMPILER to NVCC.
trans-unit.target: 由于 CMAKE_CUDA_HOST_COMPILER 仅在 CMAKE_CUDA_COMPILER_ID 为 NVIDIA 时才有意义，因此在不将 CMAKE_CUDA_HOST_COMPILER 设置为NVCC的情况下设置 CMAKE_CUDA_COMPILER 也没有意义。

trans-unit.source: Since complex_class.hpp doesn’t contain a Q_OBJECT macro it would be ignored by AUTOMOC. We change this by adding JSON_BASED_CLASS to CMAKE_AUTOMOC_MACRO_NAMES:
trans-unit.target: 由于 complex_class.hpp 不包含 Q_OBJECT 宏，因此 AUTOMOC 将忽略它。我们通过将 JSON_BASED_CLASS 添加到 CMAKE_AUTOMOC_MACRO_NAMES 来更改此设置：

trans-unit.source: Since complex_class.hpp doesn't contain a Q_OBJECT macro it would be ignored by AUTOMOC. We change this by adding JSON_BASED_CLASS to CMAKE_AUTOMOC_MACRO_NAMES:

Since CMake 2.8.10, the COMPILE_DEFINITIONS property has supported generator expressions for setting configuration-dependent content. The continued existence of the suffixed variables is redundant, and causes a maintenance burden. Population of the COMPILE_DEFINITIONS_DEBUG property may be replaced with a population of COMPILE_DEFINITIONS directly or via target_compile_definitions():
trans-unit.target: 从CMake 2.8.10开始， COMPILE_DEFINITIONS 属性支持 generator expressions 用于设置与配置有关的内容。后缀变量的继续存在是多余的，并导致维护负担。可以直接将 COMPILE_DEFINITIONS_DEBUG 属性的填充替换为 COMPILE_DEFINITIONS 的填充，或者通过 target_compile_definitions() ：

trans-unit.source: Since CMake 3.19, Interface Libraries may have arbitrary target properties. If a project exports an interface library with custom properties, the resulting package may not work with dependents configured by older versions of CMake that reject the custom properties.
trans-unit.target: 从CMake 3.19开始，接口库可以具有任意目标属性。如果项目导出具有自定义属性的接口库，则结果包可能无法与由较早版本的CMake拒绝自定义属性的配置的依赖项一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Since CMake 3.19, an INTERFACE library target may optionally contain source files. An interface library that contains source files will be included as a build target in the generated buildsystem. It does not compile sources, but may contain custom commands to generate other sources. Additionally, IDEs will show the source files as part of the target for interactive reading and editing.
trans-unit.target: 从CMake 3.19开始， INTERFACE 库目标可以选择包含源文件。包含源文件的接口库将作为生成目标包含在生成的构建系统中。它不编译源代码，但可能包含用于生成其他源代码的自定义命令。此外，IDE会将源文件显示为目标的一部分，以进行交互式阅读和编辑。

trans-unit.target: 从CMake 3.19开始,接口库目标可以用源文件创建。

trans-unit.source: Since a given linker may not support PIE flags in all environments in which it is used, it is the project’s responsibility to use the CheckPIESupported module to check for support to ensure that the POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE target property for executables will be honored at link time.
trans-unit.target: 由于给定的链接器可能并不在使用它的所有环境中都支持 PIE 标志，因此使用 CheckPIESupported 模块检查支持以确保在链接时将尊重可执行文件的 POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE 目标属性是项目的责任。

trans-unit.source: Since setup and cleanup tasks are also tests, they can have an ordering specified by the DEPENDS test property just like any other tests. This can be exploited to implement setup or cleanup using multiple tests for a single fixture to modularise setup or cleanup logic.
trans-unit.target: 由于设置和清除任务也是测试，因此它们可以像其他任何测试一样具有由 DEPENDS 测试属性指定的顺序。可以利用它对单个夹具使用多个测试来实施设置或清理，以模块化设置或清理逻辑。

trans-unit.source: Since the above approach does not tell CMake what custom command generates byproduct.txt, the Ninja generator does not have enough information to add the byproduct as an output of any rule. CMake 2.8.12 and above work around this problem and allow projects using the above approach to build by generating phony build rules to tell Ninja to tolerate such missing files. However, this workaround prevents Ninja from diagnosing a dependency that is really missing. It also works poorly in in-source builds where every custom command dependency, even on source files, needs to be treated this way because CMake does not have enough information to know which files are generated as byproducts of custom commands.
trans-unit.target: 由于上述方法没有告诉CMake哪个定制命令会生成 byproduct.txt ，因此Ninja生成器没有足够的信息来将副产品添加为任何规则的输出。 CMake 2.8.12及更高版本可解决此问题，并允许通过使用上述方法生成的项目通过生成 phony 构建规则来告诉Ninja忍受此类丢失的文件。但是，此替代方法可以防止Ninja诊断确实缺少的依赖项。它在源代码内部版本中的效果也很差，因为需要使用这种方式来处理每个自定义命令的依赖关系，即使是对源文件也是如此，因为CMake没有足够的信息来知道哪些文件是作为自定义命令的副产品生成的。

trans-unit.source: So that relative input paths work as expected, by default the working directory of the Doxygen command will be the current source directory (i.e. CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR). This can be overridden with the WORKING_DIRECTORY option to change the directory used as the relative base point. Note also that Doxygen’s default behavior is to strip the working directory from relative paths in the generated documentation (see the STRIP_FROM_PATHDoxygen config option for details).
trans-unit.target: 为了使相对输入路径按预期工作，默认情况下，Doxygen命令的工作目录将为当前源目录（即 CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR ）。可以使用 WORKING_DIRECTORY 选项将其覆盖，以更改用作相对基点的目录。还请注意，Doxygen的默认行为是从生成的文档中的相对路径中删除工作目录（有关详细信息，请参阅 STRIP_FROM_PATH Doxygen配置选项）。

trans-unit.source: Software Installation
trans-unit.target: 软件安装

trans-unit.source: Software projects often require variables to be set on the command line when invoking CMake. Some of the most commonly used CMake variables are listed in the table below:
trans-unit.target: 软件项目在调用CMake时,经常需要在命令行中设置变量。一些最常用的CMake变量列在下面的表格中。

trans-unit.source: Some CMake generators support a platform name to be given to the native build system to choose a compiler or SDK. See the CMAKE_GENERATOR_PLATFORM variable for details.
trans-unit.target: 一些CMake生成器支持将平台名称提供给本机构建系统以选择编译器或SDK。有关详细信息，请参见 CMAKE_GENERATOR_PLATFORM 变量。

trans-unit.source: Some CMake generators support a target platform name to be given to the native build system to choose a compiler toolchain. If the user specifies a platform name (e.g. via the cmake(1)-A option or via the CMAKE_GENERATOR_PLATFORM environment variable) the value will be available in this variable.
trans-unit.target: 一些CMake生成器支持将目标平台名称提供给本机构建系统以选择编译器工具链。如果用户指定平台名称（例如，通过 cmake(1) -A 选项或通过 CMAKE_GENERATOR_PLATFORM 环境变量），则该变量中的值将可用。

trans-unit.source: Some CMake generators support a toolset specification to tell the native build system how to choose a compiler. If the user specifies a toolset (e.g. via the cmake(1)-T option or via the CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET environment variable) the value will be available in this variable.
trans-unit.target: 一些CMake生成器支持工具集规范，以告诉本机生成系统如何选择编译器。如果用户指定了工具集（例如，通过 cmake(1) -T 选项或通过 CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET 环境变量），则该变量中的值将可用。

trans-unit.source: Some CMake generators support a toolset specification to tell the native build system how to choose a compiler. See the CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET variable for details.
trans-unit.target: 一些CMake生成器支持工具集规范，以告诉本机生成系统如何选择编译器。有关详细信息，请参见 CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET 变量。

trans-unit.source: Some CMake generators support selection of an instance of the native build system when multiple instances are available. If the user specifies an instance (e.g. by setting this cache entry or via the CMAKE_GENERATOR_INSTANCE environment variable), or after a default instance is chosen when a build tree is first configured, the value will be available in this variable.
trans-unit.target: 当多个实例可用时，某些CMake生成器支持选择本机生成系统的一个实例。如果用户指定了实例（例如，通过设置此缓存条目或通过 CMAKE_GENERATOR_INSTANCE 环境变量），或者在首次配置构建树时选择了默认实例后，则该变量中将提供该值。

trans-unit.source: Some CMake-generated build trees can have multiple build configurations in the same tree. This option can be used to specify which one should be tested. Example configurations are Debug and Release.
trans-unit.target: 某些CMake生成的构建树可以在同一树中具有多个构建配置。此选项可用于指定应测试的一个。示例配置为 Debug 和 Release 。

trans-unit.source: Some IDEs such as KDevelop4, QtCreator and CLion have native support for CMake-based buildsystems. Those IDEs provide user interface for selecting an underlying generator to use, typically a choice between a Makefile or a Ninja based generator.
trans-unit.target: 某些IDE（例如KDevelop4，QtCreator和CLion）对基于CMake的构建系统具有本机支持。这些IDE提供了用于选择要使用的基础生成器的用户界面，通常是在 Makefile 或基于 Ninja 的生成器之间进行选择。

trans-unit.source: Some Linux systems utilize GLVND as a new ABI for OpenGL. GLVND separates context libraries from OpenGL itself; OpenGL lives in "libOpenGL", and contexts are defined in "libGLX" or "libEGL". GLVND is currently the only way to get OpenGL 3+ functionality via EGL in a manner portable across vendors. Projects may use GLVND explicitly with target OpenGL::OpenGL and either OpenGL::GLX or OpenGL::EGL.

Some Linux systems utilize GLVND as a new ABI for OpenGL. GLVND separates context libraries from OpenGL itself; OpenGL lives in “libOpenGL”, and contexts are defined in “libGLX” or “libEGL”. GLVND is currently the only way to get OpenGL 3+ functionality via EGL in a manner portable across vendors. Projects may use GLVND explicitly with target OpenGL::OpenGL and either OpenGL::GLX or OpenGL::EGL.
trans-unit.target: 一些Linux系统利用GLVND作为OpenGL的新ABI。 GLVND将上下文库与OpenGL本身分开； OpenGL位于“ libOpenGL”中，上下文在“ libGLX”或“ libEGL”中定义。目前，GLVND是通过EGL以跨供应商移植的方式获得OpenGL 3+功能的唯一方法。项目可以在目标 OpenGL::OpenGL 和 OpenGL::GLX 或 OpenGL::EGL 显式使用GLVND 。

trans-unit.source: Some additional symbol-defines are created for particular features for use as symbols which may be conditionally defined empty:
trans-unit.target: 一些额外的符号定义是为特定的功能创建的,作为符号使用,可以有条件地定义为空。

trans-unit.source: Some archive formats allow the type of compression to be specified. The 7zip and zip archive formats already imply a specific type of compression. The other formats use no compression by default, but can be directed to do so with the COMPRESSION option. Valid values for <compression> are None, BZip2, GZip, XZ, and Zstd.
trans-unit.target: 某些存档格式允许指定压缩类型。该 7zip 的和 zip 的压缩格式已经暗示压缩的特定类型。其他格式默认情况下不使用压缩，但是可以使用 COMPRESSION 选项进行定向。为有效值 <compression> 是 None ， BZip2 压缩， GZip 压缩， XZ 和 Zstd 。

trans-unit.source: Some build artifacts for the embedded Apple platforms require mandatory code signing. If the Xcode generator is being used and code signing is required or desired, the development team ID can be specified via the CMAKE_XCODE_ATTRIBUTE_DEVELOPMENT_TEAM CMake variable. This team ID will then be included in the generated Xcode project. By default, CMake avoids the need for code signing during the internal configuration phase (i.e compiler ID and feature detection).
trans-unit.target: 嵌入式Apple平台的某些构建工件需要强制性代码签名。如果正在使用 Xcode 生成器，并且需要或希望进行代码签名，则可以通过 CMAKE_XCODE_ATTRIBUTE_DEVELOPMENT_TEAM CMake变量指定开发团队ID 。然后，该团队ID将包含在生成的Xcode项目中。默认情况下，CMake避免在内部配置阶段（即编译器ID和功能检测）进行代码签名。

trans-unit.source: Some build artifacts for the embedded Apple platforms require mandatory code signing. If the Xcode generator is being used and code signing is required or desired, the development team ID can be specified via the CMAKE_XCODE_ATTRIBUTE_DEVELOPMENT_TEAM CMake variable. This team ID will then be included in the generated Xcode project. By default, CMake avoids the need for code signing during the internal configuration phase (i.e compiler ID and feature detection).
trans-unit.target: 嵌入式Apple平台的某些构建工件需要强制性的代码签名。如果正在使用 Xcode 生成器，并且需要或希望进行代码签名，则可以通过 CMAKE_XCODE_ATTRIBUTE_DEVELOPMENT_TEAM CMake变量指定开发团队ID 。然后，该团队ID将包含在生成的Xcode项目中。默认情况下，CMake避免在内部配置阶段（即编译器ID和功能检测）进行代码签名。

trans-unit.source: Some build artifacts for the embedded Apple platforms require mandatory code signing. If the Xcode generator is being used and code signing is required or desired, the development team ID can be specified via the CMAKE_XCODE_ATTRIBUTE_DEVELOPMENT_TEAM CMake variable. This team ID will then be included in the generated Xcode project. By default, CMake avoids the need for code signing during the internal configuration phase (i.e compiler ID and feature detection).

trans-unit.target: 一些构建系统省略了在构建过程中调用的命令行的详细信息。所述 --verbose 标志可用于以使被显示的那些命令行：

trans-unit.source: Some commands refer to a root-path. This is the concatenation of root-name and root-directory-separator, either or both of which can be empty. A relative-part refers to the full path with any root-path removed.
Some compiler drivers are inherently cross-compilers, such as clang and QNX qcc. These compiler drivers support a command-line argument to specify the target to cross-compile for.
trans-unit.target: 有些编译器驱动程序本身就是交叉编译器,如 clang 和 QNX qcc。这些编译器驱动程序支持命令行参数来指定要交叉编译的目标。

trans-unit.source: Some compiler toolchains do not ship their own auxiliary utilities such as archivers and linkers. The compiler driver may support a command-line argument to specify the location of such tools. CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_EXTERNAL_TOOLCHAIN may be set to a path to the external toolchain and will be passed to the compiler driver if supported.
trans-unit.target: 某些编译器工具链不附带其自己的辅助实用程序，例如存档器和链接器。编译器驱动程序可以支持命令行参数来指定此类工具的位置。 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_EXTERNAL_TOOLCHAIN 可以设置为外部工具链的路径，如果支持，则将其传递给编译器驱动程序。

trans-unit.source: Some compilers simulate other compilers to serve as drop-in replacements. When CMake detects such a compiler it sets this variable to what would have been the CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID for the simulated compiler.
trans-unit.target: 一些编译器会模拟其他编译器以充当嵌入式替换。当CMake检测到这样的编译器时，它将将此变量设置为模拟编译器的 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID 。

trans-unit.source: Some compilers simulate other compilers to serve as drop-in replacements. When CMake detects such a compiler it sets this variable to what would have been the CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_VERSION for the simulated compiler.
trans-unit.target: 一些编译器会模拟其他编译器以充当嵌入式替换。当CMake检测到这样的编译器时，它将设置此变量为模拟编译器的 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_VERSION 。

trans-unit.source: Some compilers such as Clang are inherently cross compilers. The CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_TARGET can be set to pass a value to those supported compilers when compiling:
trans-unit.target: 某些编译器（例如Clang）本质上是交叉编译器。所述 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_TARGET 可以被设置为一个值传递给编译时那些支持的编译器：

trans-unit.source: Some compression methods used by CPack generators such as Debian or Archive may take advantage of multiple CPU cores to speed up compression. CPACK_THREADS can be set to positive integer to specify how many threads will be used for compression. If it is set to 0, CPack will set it so that all available CPU cores are used. By default CPACK_THREADS is set to 1.
Some features are suitable for wrapping in a macro with a backward compatibility implementation if the compiler does not support the feature.
trans-unit.target: 如果编译器不支持该功能,有些功能适合用一个向后兼容实现的宏来封装。

trans-unit.target: 当有组件时，某些生成器（例如RPM或ARCHIVE）（TGZ，ZIP等）可能会生成多个软件包文件，具体取决于此变量的值：

trans-unit.source: Some generators like RPM or ARCHIVE (TGZ, ZIP, ...) may generate several packages files when there are components, depending on the value of this variable:

trans-unit.source: Some generators may be additionally configured using the environment variables:
trans-unit.target: 有些生成器可以使用环境变量进行额外配置。

trans-unit.source: Some linkers support switches such as -Bstatic and -Bdynamic to determine whether to use static or shared libraries for -lXXX options. CMake uses these options to set the link type for libraries whose full paths are not known or (in some cases) are in implicit link directories for the platform. By default CMake adds an option at the end of the library list (if necessary) to set the linker search type back to its starting type. This property switches the final linker search type to -Bstatic regardless of how it started.
trans-unit.target: 某些链接器支持 -Bstatic 和 -Bdynamic 之类的开关来确定是将静态库还是共享库用于 -lXXX 选项。CMake使用这些选项来设置其完整路径未知或（在某些情况下）在平台的隐式链接目录中的库的链接类型。默认情况下，CMake在库列表的末尾添加一个选项（如有必要），以将链接器搜索类型设置回其起始类型。该属性将最终链接程序搜索类型切换为 -Bstatic ,而不管其启动方式如何。

trans-unit.source: Some linkers support switches such as -Bstatic and -Bdynamic to determine whether to use static or shared libraries for -lXXX options. CMake uses these options to set the link type for libraries whose full paths are not known or (in some cases) are in implicit link directories for the platform. By default the linker search type is assumed to be -Bdynamic at the beginning of the library list. This property switches the assumption to -Bstatic. It is intended for use when linking an executable statically (e.g. with the GNU -static option).
trans-unit.target: 某些链接器支持 -Bstatic 和 -Bdynamic 之类的开关来确定是将静态库还是共享库用于 -lXXX 选项。 CMake使用这些选项来设置其完整路径未知或（在某些情况下）在平台的隐式链接目录中的库的链接类型。默认情况下，在库列表的开头假定链接器搜索类型为 -Bdynamic 。此属性将假设切换为 -Bstatic 。它用于静态链接可执行文件时（例如，使用GNU -static 选项）。

trans-unit.source: Some native build tools always build in parallel. The use of <jobs> value of 1 can be used to limit to a single job.
trans-unit.target: 一些本地构建工具总是并行构建。使用 <jobs> 的值 1 可以被用来限制到一个单一的作业。

Some target properties are required to be compatible between a target and the interface of each dependency. For example, the POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE target property may specify a boolean value of whether a target should be compiled as position-independent-code, which has platform-specific consequences. A target may also specify the usage requirement INTERFACE_POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE to communicate that consumers must be compiled as position-independent-code.
trans-unit.target: 一些目标属性需要在目标和每个依赖项的接口之间兼容。例如， POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE 目标属性可以指定布尔值，该布尔值指示是否应将目标编译为与位置无关的代码，这将导致特定于平台的结果。目标还可以指定使用要求 INTERFACE_POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE ,以传达必须将使用者编译为与位置无关的代码的信息。

trans-unit.source: Some target types do not represent outputs of the buildsystem, but only inputs such as external dependencies, aliases or other non-build artifacts. Pseudo targets are not represented in the generated buildsystem.
trans-unit.target: 有些目标类型不代表构建系统的输出,而只代表输入,如外部依赖、别名或其他非构建工件。在生成的构建系统中不表示伪目标。

trans-unit.source: Some toolchain features have built-in handling in CMake, and do not require compile-tests. For example, POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE allows specifying that a target should be built as position-independent code, if the compiler supports that feature. The <LANG>_VISIBILITY_PRESET and VISIBILITY_INLINES_HIDDEN target properties add flags for hidden visibility, if supported by the compiler.
trans-unit.target: 某些工具链功能在CMake中具有内置处理功能，并且不需要编译测试。例如，如果编译器支持目标，则 POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE 允许指定应将目标构建为与位置无关的代码。所述 <LANG>_VISIBILITY_PRESET 和 VISIBILITY_INLINES_HIDDEN 目标属性添加标志隐藏可视性，如果编译器所支持。

trans-unit.source: Some toolchains read implicit directories from an environment variable such as LIBRARY_PATH. If using such an environment variable, keep its value consistent when operating in a given build tree because CMake saves the value detected when first creating a build tree.
trans-unit.target: 一些工具链从环境变量（例如 LIBRARY_PATH )读取隐式目录。如果使用这样的环境变量，则在给定的构建树中操作时，使其值保持一致，因为CMake会保存首次创建构建树时检测到的值。

trans-unit.source: Specified include directories may be absolute paths or relative paths. Repeated calls for the same <target> append items in the order called. If SYSTEM is specified, the compiler will be told the directories are meant as system include directories on some platforms (signalling this setting might achieve effects such as the compiler skipping warnings, or these fixed-install system files not being considered in dependency calculations - see compiler docs). If SYSTEM is used together with PUBLIC or INTERFACE, the INTERFACE_SYSTEM_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES target property will be populated with the specified directories.
trans-unit.target: 指定的包含目录可以是绝对路径或相对路径。重复调用相同的<target>会按调用顺序追加项目。如果指定了 SYSTEM ，则会在某些平台上告诉编译器目录的含义是系统包含目录（对此设置进行信号化可能会产生效果，例如编译器跳过警告，或者在依赖性计算中不考虑这些固定安装的系统文件-请参阅编译器文档）。如果 SYSTEM 与 PUBLIC 或 INTERFACE 一起使用，则 INTERFACE_SYSTEM_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 目标属性将使用指定的目录填充。

trans-unit.target: 指定用于生成标题的Java类。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a semicolon-separated list of configurations available from all build-<Config>.ninja files in the Ninja Multi-Config generator. This variable activates cross-config mode. Targets from each config specified in this variable can be built from any build-<Config>.ninja file. Custom commands will use the configuration native to build-<Config>.ninja. If it is set to all, all configurations from CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES are cross-configs. If it is not specified, or empty, each build-<Config>.ninja file will only contain build rules for its own configuration.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Ninja Multi-Config 生成器中所有 build-<Config>.ninja 文件中可用的配置的分号分隔列表。此变量激活交叉配置模式。可以从任何 build-<Config>.ninja 文件构建此变量中指定的每个配置的目标。定制命令将使用 build-<Config>.ninja 的本机配置。如果将其设置为 all ，则 CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES 中的所有配置都是交叉配置。如果未指定或为空，则每个 build-<Config>.ninja 文件将仅包含其自身配置的构建规则。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a semicolon-separated list of configurations available from all build-<Config>.ninja files in the Ninja Multi-Config generator. This variable activates cross-config mode. Targets from each config specified in this variable can be built from any build-<Config>.ninja file. Custom commands will use the configuration native to build-<Config>.ninja. If it is set to all, all configurations from CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES are cross-configs. If it is not specified, or empty, each build-<Config>.ninja file will only contain build rules for its own configuration.

Specifies a semicolon-separated list of configurations to build for a target in build.ninja if no :<Config> suffix is specified in the Ninja Multi-Config generator. If it is set to all, all configurations from CMAKE_CROSS_CONFIGS are used. If it is not specified, it defaults to CMAKE_DEFAULT_BUILD_TYPE.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 Ninja Multi-Config 生成器中未指定 :<Config> 后缀，则指定要在 build.ninja 中为目标构建的配置的分号分隔列表。如果将其设置为 all ， CMAKE_CROSS_CONFIGS 将使用CMAKE_CROSS_CONFIGS中的所有配置。如果未指定，则默认为 CMAKE_DEFAULT_BUILD_TYPE 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a semicolon-separated list of configurations to build for a target in build.ninja if no :<Config> suffix is specified in the Ninja Multi-Config generator. If it is set to all, all configurations from CMAKE_CROSS_CONFIGS are used. If it is not specified, it defaults to CMAKE_DEFAULT_BUILD_TYPE.

Specifies a semicolon-separated list of full-paths to files on which any object files compiled from this source file depend. Visual Studio Generators and the Xcode generator cannot implement such compilation dependencies.

Specifies a prefix to be prepended to the name of each discovered test case. This can be useful when the same source files are being used in multiple calls to gtest_add_test() but with different EXTRA_ARGS.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a custom command to patch the sources after an update. By default, no patch command is defined. Note that it can be quite difficult to define an appropriate patch command that performs robustly, especially for download methods such as git where changing the GIT_TAG will not discard changes from a previous patch, but the patch command will be called again after updating to the new tag.
trans-unit.target: 指定自定义命令以在更新后修补源。缺省情况下，未定义补丁命令。请注意，很难定义一个健壮的适当补丁程序命令，尤其是对于git之类的下载方法而言，更改 GIT_TAG 不会放弃先前补丁程序的更改，但是在更新到新补丁程序后将再次调用patch命令标签。
