trans-unit.target: 指定在通过调用 gtest_discover_tests() 发现的所有测试上设置的附加属性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies additional properties to be set on all tests discovered by this invocation of gtest_discover_tests.
trans-unit.target: 指定在通过调用 gtest_discover_tests 发现的所有测试上设置的其他属性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies compile definitions to use when compiling a given <target>. The named <target> must have been created by a command such as add_executable() or add_library() and must not be an ALIAS target.
trans-unit.target: 指定在编译给定的 <target> 时要使用的编译定义。命名的 <target> 必须由诸如 add_executable() 或 add_library() 之类的命令创建，并且不能为ALIAS target。

trans-unit.source: Specifies compiler features required when compiling a given target. If the feature is not listed in the CMAKE_C_COMPILE_FEATURES variable or CMAKE_CXX_COMPILE_FEATURES variable, then an error will be reported by CMake. If the use of the feature requires an additional compiler flag, such as -std=gnu++11, the flag will be added automatically.
trans-unit.target: 指定编译给定目标时所需的编译器功能。如果 CMAKE_C_COMPILE_FEATURES 变量或 CMAKE_CXX_COMPILE_FEATURES 变量中未列出功能，则CMake将报告错误。如果使用该功能需要附加的编译器标志，例如 -std=gnu++11 ，则该标志将自动添加。

trans-unit.source: Specifies compiler features required when compiling a given target. If the feature is not listed in the CMAKE_C_COMPILE_FEATURES, CMAKE_CUDA_COMPILE_FEATURES, or CMAKE_CXX_COMPILE_FEATURES variables, then an error will be reported by CMake. If the use of the feature requires an additional compiler flag, such as -std=gnu++11, the flag will be added automatically.
trans-unit.target: 指定编译给定目标时所需的编译器功能。如果 CMAKE_C_COMPILE_FEATURES ， CMAKE_CUDA_COMPILE_FEATURES 或 CMAKE_CXX_COMPILE_FEATURES 变量中未列出功能，则CMake将报告错误。如果使用此功能需要附加的编译器标志，例如 -std=gnu++11 ，则该标志将自动添加。

trans-unit.source: Specifies either <PackageName>_FOUND or <PACKAGENAME>_FOUND as the result variable. This exists only for compatibility with older versions of CMake and is now ignored. Result variables of both names are always set for compatibility.

Specifies files that will be generated by the build command but which might or might not have their modification time updated by subsequent builds. These ultimately get passed through as BYPRODUCTS to the build step’s own underlying call to add_custom_command().
trans-unit.target: 指定将由build命令生成的文件，但是它们的修改时间可能会或可能不会被后续版本更新。这些最终作为 BYPRODUCTS 传递到构建步骤自己对 add_custom_command() 的基础调用。

trans-unit.source: Specifies files that will be generated by the build command but which might or might not have their modification time updated by subsequent builds. These ultimately get passed through as BYPRODUCTS to the build step's own underlying call to add_custom_command().

Specifies how long (in seconds) CMake will wait for the test to enumerate available tests. If the test takes longer than this, discovery (and your build) will fail. Most test executables will enumerate their tests very quickly, but under some exceptional circumstances, a test may require a longer timeout. The default is 5. See also the TIMEOUT option of execute_process().
trans-unit.target: 指定CMake等待测试枚举可用测试的时间（以秒为单位）。如果测试花费的时间超过此时间，则发现（和您的构建）将失败。大多数测试可执行文件会很快枚举其测试，但是在某些特殊情况下，测试可能需要更长的超时时间。默认值为5。另请参见 execute_process() 的 TIMEOUT 选项。

trans-unit.source: Specifies include directories to use when compiling a given target. The named <target> must have been created by a command such as add_executable() or add_library() and must not be an ALIAS target.
trans-unit.target: 指定在编译给定目标时要使用的包含目录。命名的 <target> 必须由诸如 add_executable() 或 add_library() 之类的命令创建，并且不能为ALIAS target。

trans-unit.source: Specifies language whose compiler will invoke the linker.
trans-unit.target: 指定编译器将调用链接器的语言。

trans-unit.source: Specifies one of the Object Kinds to be included in the reply.
trans-unit.target: 指定要包含在回复中的对象种类之一。

trans-unit.source: Specifies one of the supported Object Kinds.
trans-unit.target: 指定受支持的对象种类之一。

trans-unit.source: Specifies sources to use when building a target and/or its dependents. Relative source file paths are interpreted as being relative to the current source directory (i.e. CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR). The named <target> must have been created by a command such as add_executable() or add_library() and must not be an ALIAS target.
trans-unit.target: 指定在构建目标和/或其依赖项时要使用的源。相对源文件路径被解释为相对于当前源目录（即 CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR ）。命名的 <target> 必须由诸如 add_executable() 或 add_library() 之类的命令创建，并且不能为ALIAS target。

trans-unit.source: Specifies sources to use when building a target and/or its dependents. The named <target> must have been created by a command such as add_executable() or add_library() or add_custom_target() and must not be an ALIAS target.

Specifies sources to use when compiling a given target. Relative source file paths are interpreted as being relative to the current source directory (i.e. CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR). The named <target> must have been created by a command such as add_executable() or add_library() and must not be an ALIAS target.
trans-unit.target: 指定在编译给定目标时要使用的源。相对源文件路径被解释为相对于当前源目录（即 CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR ）。命名的 <target> 必须由诸如 add_executable() 或 add_library() 之类的命令创建，并且不能为ALIAS target。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that an IMPORTED shared library target has no soname.
trans-unit.target: 指定 IMPORTED 共享库目标没有 soname 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the target should be compiled as a Continuous Background Task library.
trans-unit.target: 指定目标应被编译为持续后台任务库。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that this test should only be run after the specified list of tests.
trans-unit.target: 指定该测试只能在指定的测试列表之后运行。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the CMake default generator to use when no generator is supplied with -G. If the provided value doesn’t name a generator known by CMake, the internal default is used. Either way the resulting generator selection is stored in the CMAKE_GENERATOR variable.
trans-unit.target: 指定 -G 没有提供生成器时使用的CMake默认生成器。如果提供的值未命名CMake已知的生成器，则使用内部默认值。无论哪种方式，生成的生成器选择都存储在 CMAKE_GENERATOR 变量中。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the CMake default generator to use when no generator is supplied with -G. If the provided value doesn't name a generator known by CMake, the internal default is used. Either way the resulting generator selection is stored in the CMAKE_GENERATOR variable.
Specifies the Google Test executable, which must be a known CMake executable target. CMake will substitute the location of the built executable when running the test.
trans-unit.target: 指定Google测试可执行文件,它必须是一个已知的CMake可执行文件目标。当运行测试时,CMake将替代构建的可执行文件的位置。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the available build types on multi-config generators.
trans-unit.target: 指定多配置生成器上的可用构建类型。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the build type on single-configuration generators.
trans-unit.target: 指定单配置生成器的构建类型。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the configuration to use by default in a build.ninja file in the Ninja Multi-Config generator. If this variable is specified, build.ninja uses build rules from build-<Config>.ninja by default. All custom commands are executed with this configuration. If the variable is not specified, the first item from CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES is used instead.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Ninja Multi-Config 生成器中的 build.ninja 文件默认使用的配置。如果指定了此变量，则默认情况下 build.ninja 使用 build-<Config>.ninja 中的构建规则。使用此配置执行所有自定义命令。如果未指定变量，则使用 CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES 中的第一项。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the configuration to use by default in a build.ninja file in the Ninja Multi-Config generator. If this variable is specified, build.ninja uses build rules from build-<Config>.ninja by default. All custom commands are executed with this configuration. If the variable is not specified, the first item from CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES is used instead.

Specifies the deployment location for a content source file with a Windows Phone or Windows Store application when built with a Visual Studio generators. This property is only applicable when using VS_DEPLOYMENT_CONTENT. The value represent the path relative to the app package and applies to all configurations.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Visual Studio generators 构建时，为Windows Phone或Windows Store应用程序指定内容源文件的部署位置。该属性仅在使用 VS_DEPLOYMENT_CONTENT 时适用。该值表示相对于应用程序包的路径，并适用于所有配置。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the directory in which to run the discovered test cases. If this option is not provided, the current binary directory is used.
trans-unit.target: 指定运行已发现的测试用例的目录,如果没有提供这个选项,则使用当前的二进制目录。如果没有提供这个选项,则使用当前的二进制目录。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum number of concurrent processes to use when building using the cmake --build command line Build Tool Mode.
trans-unit.target: 指定使用 cmake --build 命令行“ 构建工具模式”进行构建时要使用的最大并发进程数。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum number of source files that can be combined into any one unity source file when unity builds are enabled by the UNITY_BUILD target property. The original source files will be distributed across as many unity source files as necessary to honor this limit.
trans-unit.target: 指定当 UNITY_BUILD 目标属性启用统一构建时，可以合并到任何一个统一源文件中的最大源文件数。原始源文件将根据需要分布在尽可能多的统一源文件中。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the entry point for the shader of a .hlsl source file.
trans-unit.target: 指定 .hlsl 源文件的着色器的入口点名称。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the paths in which the linker should search for libraries when linking a given target. Each item can be an absolute or relative path, with the latter being interpreted as relative to the current source directory. These items will be added to the link command.
trans-unit.target: 指定链接器在链接给定目标时应该搜索库的路径。每项可以是绝对路径或相对路径,后者被解释为相对于当前源目录。这些项目将被添加到链接命令中。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the shader model of a .hlsl source file. Some shader types can only be used with recent shader models
trans-unit.target: 指定 .hlsl 源文件的着色器模型。某些着色器类型只能与最新的着色器模型一起使用

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the Desktop Extensions that should be included in the target. For example 10.0.10240.0. If the value is not specified, the Desktop Extensions will not be included. To use the same version of the extensions as the Windows 10 SDK that is being used, you can use the CMAKE_VS_WINDOWS_TARGET_PLATFORM_VERSION variable.
trans-unit.target: 指定应包含在目标中的桌面扩展的版本。例如 10.0.10240.0 。如果未指定该值，将不包括Desktop Extensions。要使用与所使用的Windows 10 SDK相同的扩展版本，可以使用 CMAKE_VS_WINDOWS_TARGET_PLATFORM_VERSION 变量。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the IoT Extensions that should be included in the target. For example 10.0.10240.0. If the value is not specified, the IoT Extensions will not be included. To use the same version of the extensions as the Windows 10 SDK that is being used, you can use the CMAKE_VS_WINDOWS_TARGET_PLATFORM_VERSION variable.
trans-unit.target: 指定应包含在目标中的IoT扩展的版本。例如 10.0.10240.0 。如果未指定该值，则不包括IoT扩展。要使用与所使用的Windows 10 SDK相同的扩展版本，可以使用 CMAKE_VS_WINDOWS_TARGET_PLATFORM_VERSION 变量。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the Mobile Extensions that should be included in the target. For example 10.0.10240.0. If the value is not specified, the Mobile Extensions will not be included. To use the same version of the extensions as the Windows 10 SDK that is being used, you can use the CMAKE_VS_WINDOWS_TARGET_PLATFORM_VERSION variable.
trans-unit.target: 指定目标中应包含的移动扩展的版本。例如 10.0.10240.0 。如果未指定该值，那么将不包括移动扩展。要使用与所使用的Windows 10 SDK相同的扩展版本，可以使用 CMAKE_VS_WINDOWS_TARGET_PLATFORM_VERSION 变量。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the working directory to set before running the custom step’s command. If this option is not specified, the directory will be the value of the CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR at the point where ExternalProject_Add_Step() was called.
trans-unit.target: 指定在运行定制步骤的命令之前要设置的工作目录。如果没有指定这个选项时，该目录将成为价值 CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR 在点在哪里 ExternalProject_Add_Step() 被调用。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the working directory to set before running the custom step's command. If this option is not specified, the directory will be the value of the CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR at the point where ExternalProject_Add_Step() was called.
Specifies various paths to look up classes. Here .class files, jar files or targets created by command add_jar can be used.
trans-unit.target: 指定各种查找类的路径。这里可以使用.class文件、jar文件或通过命令add_jar创建的目标。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether pkg_check_modules() and pkg_search_module() should add the paths in the CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH, CMAKE_FRAMEWORK_PATH and CMAKE_APPBUNDLE_PATH cache and environment variables to the pkg-config search path.
trans-unit.target: 指定 pkg_check_modules() 和 pkg_search_module() 是否应将 CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH ， CMAKE_FRAMEWORK_PATH 和 CMAKE_APPBUNDLE_PATH 高速缓存以及环境变量中的路径添加到 pkg-config 搜索路径。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether certificate verification should be performed for https URLs. If this option is not provided, the default behavior is determined by the CMAKE_TLS_VERIFY variable (see file(DOWNLOAD)). If that is also not set, certificate verification will not be performed. In situations where URL_HASH cannot be provided, this option can be an alternative verification measure.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否应该对https URL执行证书验证。如果未提供此选项，则默认行为由 CMAKE_TLS_VERIFY 变量确定（请参见 file(DOWNLOAD) ）。如果还没有设置，将不会执行证书验证。在无法提供 URL_HASH 的情况下，此选项可以作为替代验证措施。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether this step is independent of the external dependencies specified by the ExternalProject_Add()’s DEPENDS option. The default is FALSE. Steps marked as independent may depend only on other steps marked independent. See policy CMP0114.
trans-unit.target: 指定此步骤是否独立于 ExternalProject_Add() 的 DEPENDS 选项指定的外部依赖项。默认值为 FALSE 。标记为独立的步骤可能仅取决于标记为独立的其他步骤。请参阅策略 CMP0114 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether this step is independent of the external dependencies specified by the ExternalProject_Add()'s DEPENDS option. The default is FALSE. Steps marked as independent may depend only on other steps marked independent. See policy CMP0114.
Specifies whether to trust the Subversion server site certificate. If enabled, the --trust-server-cert option is passed to the svn checkout and update commands.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否信任Subversion服务器站点证书。如果启用，则 --trust-server-cert 选项将传递到 svn checkout和update命令。

trans-unit.source: Specify #include line transforms for dependencies in a target.
trans-unit.target: 为目标中的依赖关系指定#include行变换。

trans-unit.source: Specify #include line transforms for dependencies in a directory.
trans-unit.target: 为目录中的依赖性指定 #include 行转换。

trans-unit.source: Specify #include line transforms for dependencies in a target.
trans-unit.target: 为目标中的依赖项指定 #include 行转换。

trans-unit.source: Specify -Ddefinition arguments to pass to add_definitions() in the generated test project.
trans-unit.target: 指定 -Ddefinition 自变量以传递给生成的测试项目中的 add_definitions() 。

trans-unit.source: Specify Compile Definition
trans-unit.target: 指定编译定义

trans-unit.source: Specify HTTP header to be included in the request to CDash during submission. For example, CDash can be configured to only accept submissions from authenticated clients. In this case, you should provide a bearer token in your header:
trans-unit.target: 指定在提交过程中要包含在向CDash的请求中的HTTP头。例如,CDash可以被配置为只接受来自已认证客户的提交。在这种情况下,您应该在头中提供一个不记名标记。

trans-unit.source: Specify a resource specification file.
trans-unit.target: 指定资源规范文件。

trans-unit.source: Specify a semicolon-separated list containing a command line for a compiler launching tool. The Makefile Generators and the Ninja generator will run this tool and pass the compiler and its arguments to the tool. Some example tools are distcc and ccache.
trans-unit.target: 指定以分号分隔的列表，其中包含用于编译器启动工具的命令行。在Makefile文件发电机和 Ninja 发电机将运行该工具，并通过编译器和它的参数的工具。一些示例工具是distcc和ccache。

trans-unit.source: Specify a semicolon-separated list containing a command line for a compiler launching tool. The Makefile Generators and the Ninja generator will run this tool and pass the compiler and its arguments to the tool. Some example tools are distcc and ccache.
trans-unit.target: 指定以分号分隔的列表，其中包含用于编译器启动工具的命令行。在Makefile文件发电机和 Ninja 发电机将运行该工具，并通过编译器和它的参数的工具。一些示例工具是distcc和ccache。

trans-unit.source: Specify a semicolon-separated list containing a command line for a compiler launching tool. The Makefile Generators and the Ninja generator will run this tool and pass the compiler and its arguments to the tool. Some example tools are distcc and ccache.

Specify a semicolon-separated list containing a command line for the clang-tidy tool. The Makefile Generators and the Ninja generator will run this tool along with the compiler and report a warning if the tool reports any problems.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个用分号分隔的列表，其中包含 clang-tidy 工具的命令行。在Makefile文件发电机和 Ninja 发电机将与编译器一起运行此工具，如果工具报告任何问题报告警告。

trans-unit.source: Specify a semicolon-separated list containing a command line for the clang-tidy tool. The Makefile Generators and the Ninja generator will run this tool along with the compiler and report a warning if the tool reports any problems.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个用分号分隔的列表，其中包含 clang-tidy 工具的命令行。在Makefile文件发电机和 Ninja 发电机将与编译器一起运行此工具，如果工具报告任何问题报告警告。

trans-unit.source: Specify a semicolon-separated list containing a command line for the clang-tidy tool. The Makefile Generators and the Ninja generator will run this tool along with the compiler and report a warning if the tool reports any problems.

Specify a semicolon-separated list containing a command line for the cppcheck static analysis tool. The Makefile Generators and the Ninja generator will run cppcheck along with the compiler and report any problems. If the command-line specifies the exit code options to cppcheck then the build will fail if the tool returns non-zero.
trans-unit.target: 指定以分号分隔的列表，其中包含 cppcheck 静态分析工具的命令行。在Makefile文件发电机和 Ninja 发电机将运行 cppcheck 与编译器一起，并报告任何问题。如果命令行将退出代码选项指定为 cppcheck ,则如果该工具返回非零值，则构建将失败。

trans-unit.source: Specify a semicolon-separated list containing a command line for the cppcheck static analysis tool. The Makefile Generators and the Ninja generator will run cppcheck along with the compiler and report any problems. If the command-line specifies the exit code options to cppcheck then the build will fail if the tool returns non-zero.
trans-unit.target: 指定以分号分隔的列表，其中包含 cppcheck 静态分析工具的命令行。在Makefile文件发电机和 Ninja 发电机将运行 cppcheck 与编译器一起，并报告任何问题。如果命令行将退出代码选项指定为 cppcheck ,则如果该工具返回非零值，则构建将失败。

trans-unit.source: Specify a semicolon-separated list containing a command line for the cppcheck static analysis tool. The Makefile Generators and the Ninja generator will run cppcheck along with the compiler and report any problems. If the command-line specifies the exit code options to cppcheck then the build will fail if the tool returns non-zero.

Specify a semicolon-separated list containing a command line for the cpplint style checker. The Makefile Generators and the Ninja generator will run cpplint along with the compiler and report any problems.
trans-unit.target: 为 cpplint 样式检查器指定一个包含命令行的用分号分隔的列表。在Makefile文件发电机和 Ninja 发电机将运行 cpplint 与编译器一起，并报告任何问题。

trans-unit.source: Specify a semicolon-separated list containing a command line for the cpplint style checker. The Makefile Generators and the Ninja generator will run cpplint along with the compiler and report any problems.
trans-unit.target: 为 cpplint 样式检查器指定一个包含命令行的用分号分隔的列表。在Makefile文件发电机和 Ninja 发电机将运行 cpplint 与编译器一起，并报告任何问题。

trans-unit.source: Specify a semicolon-separated list containing a command line for the cpplint style checker. The Makefile Generators and the Ninja generator will run cpplint along with the compiler and report any problems.

Specify a semicolon-separated list containing a command line for the include-what-you-use tool. The Makefile Generators and the Ninja generator will run this tool along with the compiler and report a warning if the tool reports any problems.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个用分号分隔的列表，其中包含 include-what-you-use 工具的命令行。在Makefile文件发电机和 Ninja 发电机将与编译器一起运行此工具，如果工具报告任何问题报告警告。

trans-unit.source: Specify a semicolon-separated list containing a command line for the include-what-you-use tool. The Makefile Generators and the Ninja generator will run this tool along with the compiler and report a warning if the tool reports any problems.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个用分号分隔的列表，其中包含 include-what-you-use 工具的命令行。在Makefile文件发电机和 Ninja 发电机将与编译器一起运行此工具，如果工具报告任何问题报告警告。

trans-unit.source: Specify a semicolon-separated list containing a command line for the include-what-you-use tool. The Makefile Generators and the Ninja generator will run this tool along with the compiler and report a warning if the tool reports any problems.
Specify a resource specification file. See Resource Allocation for more information.
trans-unit.target: 指定资源规范文件。有关更多信息，请参见资源分配。

trans-unit.source: Specify a pool for the Ninja generator. Incompatible with USES_TERMINAL, which implies the console pool. Using a pool that is not defined by JOB_POOLS causes an error by ninja at build time.
trans-unit.target: 为 Ninja 生成器指定一个 pool 。与 USES_TERMINAL 不兼容，后者暗示 console 池。使用未由 JOB_POOLS 定义的池会导致忍者在构建时出错。

trans-unit.source: Specify a pool for the Ninja generator. Incompatible with USES_TERMINAL, which implies the console pool. Using a pool that is not defined by JOB_POOLS causes an error by ninja at build time.
trans-unit.target: 为 Ninja 生成器指定一个 pool 。与 USES_TERMINAL 不兼容，后者暗示 console 池。使用未由 JOB_POOLS 定义的池会导致忍者在构建时出错。

trans-unit.source: Specify a pool for the Ninja generator. Incompatible with USES_TERMINAL, which implies the console pool. Using a pool that is not defined by JOB_POOLS causes an error by ninja at build time.
Specify a <suffix> to tell the find_library() command to search in a lib<suffix> directory before each lib directory that would normally be searched.

trans-unit.source: Specify an installation component name with which the install rule is associated, such as "runtime" or "development". The default component name may be controlled with the CMAKE_INSTALL_DEFAULT_COMPONENT_NAME variable.

Specify an installation component name with which the install rule is associated, such as “runtime” or “development”. During component-specific installation only install rules associated with the given component name will be executed. During a full installation all components are installed unless marked with EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL. If COMPONENT is not provided a default component “Unspecified” is created. The default component name may be controlled with the CMAKE_INSTALL_DEFAULT_COMPONENT_NAME variable.
trans-unit.target: 指定与安装规则相关联的安装组件名称，例如“运行时”或“开发”。在特定于组件的安装过程中，将仅执行与给定组件名称关联的安装规则。在完整安装期间，除非标记为 EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL ,否则将安装所有组件。如果未提供 COMPONENT ,则会创建默认组件“未指定”。可以使用 CMAKE_INSTALL_DEFAULT_COMPONENT_NAME 变量来控制默认组件名称。

trans-unit.source: Specify files on which the command depends. Each argument is converted to a dependency as follows:
trans-unit.target: 指定命令所依赖的文件。每个参数都会被转换为依赖关系,如下所示。

trans-unit.source: Specify files on which the command depends. If any dependency is an OUTPUT of another custom command in the same directory (CMakeLists.txt file) CMake automatically brings the other custom command into the target in which this command is built. If DEPENDS is not specified the command will run whenever the OUTPUT is missing; if the command does not actually create the OUTPUT then the rule will always run. If DEPENDS specifies any target (created by the add_custom_target(), add_executable(), or add_library() command) a target-level dependency is created to make sure the target is built before any target using this custom command. Additionally, if the target is an executable or library a file-level dependency is created to cause the custom command to re-run whenever the target is recompiled.
trans-unit.target: 指定命令所依赖的文件。如果有任何依赖关系是同一目录（ CMakeLists.txt 文件）中另一个自定义命令的 OUTPUT ，则CMake会自动将另一个自定义命令带入构建此命令的目标中。如果未指定 DEPENDS ,则每当缺少 OUTPUT 时，命令就会运行；如果该命令实际上未创建 OUTPUT ,则该规则将始终运行。如果 DEPENDS 指定任何目标（由 add_custom_target() ， add_executable() 或 add_library() 创建)命令），将创建目标级别的依存关系，以确保使用此自定义命令在任何目标之前先构建目标。此外，如果目标是可执行文件或库，则将创建文件级依赖关系，以使自定义命令在重新编译目标时重新运行。

trans-unit.source: Specify flags of the form -DVAR:TYPE=VALUE to be passed to the cmake command-line used to drive the test build. The above example shows how values for variables INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES, LINK_DIRECTORIES, and LINK_LIBRARIES are used.
trans-unit.target: 指定形式为 -DVAR:TYPE=VALUE 的标志，以将其传递到用于驱动测试构建的 cmake 命令行。上面的示例显示了如何使用变量 INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES ， LINK_DIRECTORIES 和 LINK_LIBRARIES 的值。

trans-unit.source: Specify flags of the form -DVAR:TYPE=VALUE to be passed to the cmake command-line used to drive the test build. The example in try_compile() shows how values for variables INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES, LINK_DIRECTORIES, and LINK_LIBRARIES are used.
trans-unit.target: 指定形式为 -DVAR:TYPE=VALUE 的标志，以将其传递到用于驱动测试构建的 cmake 命令行。 try_compile() 中的示例说明如何使用变量 INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES ， LINK_DIRECTORIES 和 LINK_LIBRARIES 的值。

trans-unit.source: Specify flags to be added to the bison command line.
trans-unit.target: 指定要添加到 bison 命令行的标志。

trans-unit.source: Specify how components are grouped for multi-package component-aware CPack generators.
trans-unit.target: 为多包组件感知CPack生成器指定组件的分组方式。

trans-unit.source: Specify how long (in seconds) to wait after a timed-out submission before attempting to re-submit.
trans-unit.target: 指定在超时提交后等待多长时间(以秒为单位)再尝试重新提交。

trans-unit.source: Specify how many times to retry a timed-out submission.
trans-unit.target: 指定重试超时提交的次数。

trans-unit.source: Specify labels for the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 指定当前目录的标签。

trans-unit.source: Specify languages whose compilers to check. Languages C, CXX, and Fortran are supported.
trans-unit.target: 指定要检查其编译器的语言。支持语言 C ， CXX 和 Fortran 。

trans-unit.source: Specify libraries or flags to use when linking a given target and/or its dependents. Usage requirements from linked library targets will be propagated. Usage requirements of a target’s dependencies affect compilation of its own sources.
trans-unit.target: 指定链接给定目标和/或其依赖项时要使用的库或标志。来自链接库目标的使用要求将被传播。目标依赖项的使用要求会影响其自身源代码的编译。

trans-unit.source: Specify libraries or flags to use when linking a given target and/or its dependents. Usage requirements from linked library targets will be propagated. Usage requirements of a target's dependencies affect compilation of its own sources.

Specify libraries or flags to use when linking any targets created later in the current directory or below by commands such as add_executable() or add_library(). See the target_link_libraries() command for meaning of arguments.
trans-unit.target: 指定当通过诸如 add_executable() 或 add_library() 之类的命令链接在当前目录或更低版本中稍后创建的任何目标时要使用的库或标志。有关参数的含义，请参见 target_link_libraries() 命令。

trans-unit.source: Specify libraries to be linked in the generated project. The list of libraries may refer to system libraries and to Imported Targets from the calling project.
trans-unit.target: 指定要在生成的项目中链接的库。库列表可以引用系统库以及从调用项目中导入的目标。

trans-unit.source: Specify link step options to pass to target_link_options() in the generated project.
trans-unit.target: 指定链接步骤选项以传递给生成的项目中的 target_link_options() 。

trans-unit.source: Specify link step options to pass to target_link_options() or to set the STATIC_LIBRARY_OPTIONS target property in the generated project, depending on the CMAKE_TRY_COMPILE_TARGET_TYPE variable.
trans-unit.target: 根据 CMAKE_TRY_COMPILE_TARGET_TYPE 变量，指定链接步骤选项以传递给 target_link_options() 或在生成的项目中设置 STATIC_LIBRARY_OPTIONS 目标属性。

trans-unit.source: Specify modification time recorded in tarball entries.
trans-unit.target: 指定记录在 tarball 条目中的修改时间。

trans-unit.source: Specify one or more of the following components as you call this find module. See example below.
trans-unit.target: 当您调用这个查找模块时,请指定一个或多个以下组件。见下面的例子。

trans-unit.source: Specify one or more possible names for the file in a directory.
trans-unit.target: 为目录中的文件指定一个或多个可能的名称。

trans-unit.source: Specify one or more possible names for the full path to a file.
trans-unit.target: 为文件的完整路径指定一个或多个可能的名称。

trans-unit.source: Specify one or more possible names for the library.
trans-unit.target: 为库指定一个或多个可能的名称。

trans-unit.source: Specify one or more possible names for the program.
trans-unit.target: 为程序指定一个或多个可能的名称。

trans-unit.source: Specify options to be passed to gcov. The gcov command is run as gcov <options>... -o <gcov-dir> <file>.gcda. If not specified, the default option is just -b -x.
trans-unit.target: 指定要传递给gcov的选项。所述 gcov 命令运行作为 gcov <options>... -o <gcov-dir> <file>.gcda 。如果未指定，则默认选项为 -b -x 。

trans-unit.source: Specify options to sanitizers when running with a sanitize-enabled build.
trans-unit.target: 当运行已启用 sanitizen 的构建时,指定 sanitizer 的选项。

trans-unit.source: Specify other targets on which the external project depends. The other targets will be brought up to date before any of the external project’s steps are executed. Because the external project uses additional custom targets internally for each step, the DEPENDS option is the most convenient way to ensure all of those steps depend on the other targets. Simply doing add_dependencies(<name> <targets>) will not make any of the steps dependent on <targets>.
trans-unit.target: 指定外部项目所依赖的其他目标。在执行外部项目的任何步骤之前，将更新其他目标。由于外部项目在每个步骤的内部都使用其他自定义目标，因此 DEPENDS 选项是确保所有这些步骤都依赖于其他目标的最便捷方法。简单地执行 add_dependencies(<name> <targets>) 不会使任何步骤依赖于 <targets> 。

trans-unit.source: Specify other targets on which the external project depends. The other targets will be brought up to date before any of the external project's steps are executed. Because the external project uses additional custom targets internally for each step, the DEPENDS option is the most convenient way to ensure all of those steps depend on the other targets. Simply doing add_dependencies(<name> <targets>) will not make any of the steps dependent on <targets>.
Specify output directory for Fortran modules provided by the target.
trans-unit.target: 指定目标提供的Fortran模块的输出目录。

trans-unit.source: Specify output directory for Swift modules provided by the target.
trans-unit.target: 指定目标提供的Swift模块的输出目录。

trans-unit.source: Specify output suffix to be used for ISPC generated headers provided by the target.
Specify path to executable in the Info section of the generated Xcode scheme. If not set the schema generator will select the current target if it is actually executable.
trans-unit.target: 在生成的Xcode方案的信息部分指定可执行文件的路径。如果没有设置,模式生成器将选择当前目标,如果它确实是可执行的。

trans-unit.source: Specify permissions for installed files. Valid permissions are OWNER_READ, OWNER_WRITE, OWNER_EXECUTE, GROUP_READ, GROUP_WRITE, GROUP_EXECUTE, WORLD_READ, WORLD_WRITE, WORLD_EXECUTE, SETUID, and SETGID. Permissions that do not make sense on certain platforms are ignored on those platforms.
trans-unit.target: 指定安装文件的权限。有效权限是 OWNER_READ ， OWNER_WRITE ， OWNER_EXECUTE ， GROUP_READ ， GROUP_WRITE ， GROUP_EXECUTE ， WORLD_READ ， WORLD_WRITE ， WORLD_EXECUTE ， SETUID 和 SETGID 。在某些平台上没有意义的权限将在那些平台上被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Specify platform name if supported by generator.
trans-unit.target: 如果生成器支持,请指定平台名称。

trans-unit.source: Specify private header files in a FRAMEWORK shared library target.

trans-unit.target: 在文件中指定公共头文件 FRAMEWORK 共享库目标中。

trans-unit.source: Specify relative output directory for ISPC headers provided by the target.

trans-unit.source: Specify resources required by a test, grouped in a way that is meaningful to the test. See resource allocation for more information on how this property integrates into the CTest resource allocation feature.

trans-unit.source: Specify rules to run at install time.

trans-unit.source: Specify that it is not an error if the file to be installed does not exist.

trans-unit.source: Specify the CTest ResourceSpecFile setting in a ctest(1) dashboard client script.
trans-unit.target: 在 ctest(1) 仪表板客户端脚本中指定CTest ResourceSpecFile 设置。

trans-unit.source: Specify the CTest SVNCommand setting in a ctest(1) dashboard client script.
trans-unit.target: 在 ctest(1) 仪表板客户端脚本中指定CTest SVNCommand 设置。

trans-unit.source: Specify the CTest SVNOptions setting in a ctest(1) dashboard client script.
trans-unit.target: 在 ctest(1) 仪表板客户端脚本中指定CTest SVNOptions 设置。

trans-unit.source: Specify the CTest SVNUpdateOptions setting in a ctest(1) dashboard client script.
trans-unit.target: 在 ctest(1) 仪表板客户端脚本中指定CTest SVNUpdateOptions 设置。

trans-unit.source: Specify the CTest Site setting in a ctest(1) dashboard client script.
trans-unit.target: 在 ctest(1) 仪表板客户端脚本中指定“ CTest Site 设置。

trans-unit.source: Specify the CTest SourceDirectory setting in a ctest(1) dashboard client script.
trans-unit.target: 在 ctest(1) 仪表板客户端脚本中指定CTest SourceDirectory 设置。

trans-unit.source: Specify the CTest SubmitURL setting in a ctest(1) dashboard client script.
trans-unit.target: 在 ctest(1) 仪表板客户端脚本中指定CTest SubmitURL 设置。

trans-unit.source: Specify the CTest TimeOut setting in a ctest(1) dashboard client script.
trans-unit.target: 在 ctest(1) 仪表板客户端脚本中指定CTest TimeOut 设置。

trans-unit.source: Specify the CTest UpdateCommand setting in a ctest(1) dashboard client script.
trans-unit.target: 在 ctest(1) 仪表板客户端脚本中指定CTest UpdateCommand 设置。

trans-unit.source: Specify the CTest UpdateOptions setting in a ctest(1) dashboard client script.
trans-unit.target: 在 ctest(1) 仪表板客户端脚本中指定CTest UpdateOptions 设置。

trans-unit.source: Specify the CTest UseLaunchers setting in a ctest(1) dashboard client script.
trans-unit.target: 在 ctest(1) 仪表板客户端脚本中指定CTest UseLaunchers 设置。

trans-unit.source: Specify the CUDA toolkit version to use or the path to a standalone CUDA toolkit directory. Supported by VS 2010 and above. The version can only be used with the CUDA toolkit VS integration globally installed. See the CMAKE_VS_PLATFORM_TOOLSET_CUDA and CMAKE_VS_PLATFORM_TOOLSET_CUDA_CUSTOM_DIR variables.
trans-unit.target: 指定要使用的CUDA工具包版本或独立CUDA工具包目录的路径。VS 2010及更高版本支持。该版本只能与全局安装的CUDA工具包VS集成一起使用。请参阅 CMAKE_VS_PLATFORM_TOOLSET_CUDA 和 CMAKE_VS_PLATFORM_TOOLSET_CUDA_CUSTOM_DIR 变量。

trans-unit.source: Specify the CUDA toolkit version to use. Supported by VS 2010 and above with the CUDA toolkit VS integration installed. See the CMAKE_VS_PLATFORM_TOOLSET_CUDA variable.
trans-unit.target: 指定要使用的CUDA工具包版本。已安装VS集成的CUDA工具包受VS 2010及更高版本支持。请参阅 CMAKE_VS_PLATFORM_TOOLSET_CUDA 变量。

trans-unit.source: Specify the actual import name of the module in the target language. This is required if it cannot be scanned automatically from source or different from the module file basename. For example:
trans-unit.target: 指定目标语言中模块的实际导入名称。如果不能从源文件中自动扫描或与模块文件的基名不同,则需要指定该名称。例如

trans-unit.source: Specify the base directory of the MPI installation.
trans-unit.target: 指定MPI安装的基础目录。

trans-unit.source: Specify the beginning of a range of test numbers.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个测试号码范围的开始。

trans-unit.source: Specify the build configuration (e.g. Debug). If not specified the CTEST_BUILD_CONFIGURATION variable will be checked. Otherwise the -C <cfg> option given to the ctest(1) command will be used, if any.
trans-unit.target: 指定构建配置（例如 Debug ）。如果未指定，将检查 CTEST_BUILD_CONFIGURATION 变量。否则，将使用赋予 ctest(1) 命令的 -C <cfg> 选项（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: Specify the build directory location. This option is ignored if BUILD_IN_SOURCE is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 指定构建目录位置。如果启用了 BUILD_IN_SOURCE ,则忽略此选项。

trans-unit.source: Specify the command-line(s) to execute at build time. If more than one COMMAND is specified they will be executed in order, but not necessarily composed into a stateful shell or batch script. (To run a full script, use the configure_file() command or the file(GENERATE) command to create it, and then specify a COMMAND to launch it.)
trans-unit.target: 指定在构建时执行的命令行。如果有多个 COMMAND 指定，他们将在顺序执行，但并不一定构成为有状态shell或批处理脚本。 （要运行完整脚本，请使用 configure_file() 命令或 file(GENERATE) 命令创建它，然后指定一个 COMMAND 启动它。）

trans-unit.source: Specify the command-line(s) to execute at build time. If more than one COMMAND is specified they will be executed in order, but not necessarily composed into a stateful shell or batch script. (To run a full script, use the configure_file() command or the file(GENERATE) command to create it, and then specify a COMMAND to launch it.) The optional ARGS argument is for backward compatibility and will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 指定在构建时执行的命令行。如果有多个 COMMAND 指定，他们将在顺序执行，但并不一定构成为有状态shell或批处理脚本。（要运行完整脚本，请使用 configure_file() 命令或 file(GENERATE) 命令创建它，然后指定一个 COMMAND 启动它。）可选的 ARGS 参数用于向后兼容，将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Specify the configuration file read by cpack to provide the packaging details. By default, CPackConfig.cmake in the current directory will be used.
trans-unit.target: 指定 cpack 读取的配置文件以提供打包详细信息。默认情况下，将使用当前目录中的 CPackConfig.cmake 。

trans-unit.source: Specify the current version of your source tree.
trans-unit.target: 指定你的源代码树的当前版本。

trans-unit.source: Specify the default startup project in a Visual Studio solution.
trans-unit.target: 指定Visual Studio解决方案中的默认启动项目。

trans-unit.source: Specify the directory for the executable.
trans-unit.target: 指定可执行文件的目录。

trans-unit.source: Specify the directory on disk to which a file will be installed. Arguments can be relative or absolute paths.
trans-unit.target: 指定要安装文件的磁盘目录。参数可以是相对或绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: Specify the directory on disk to which a file will be installed. If a full path (with a leading slash or drive letter) is given it is used directly. If a relative path is given it is interpreted relative to the value of the CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX variable. The prefix can be relocated at install time using the DESTDIR mechanism explained in the CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX variable documentation.
trans-unit.target: 指定磁盘上要安装文件的目录。如果给出了完整路径（带有斜杠或驱动器号的前导），则直接使用它。如果给出了相对路径，则将相对于 CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX 变量的值进行解释。可以使用 CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX 变量文档中介绍的 DESTDIR 机制在安装时重定位该前缀。

trans-unit.source: Specify the documentation string for the <VAR> cache entry.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <VAR> 缓存条目的文档字符串。

trans-unit.source: Specify the end of a range of test numbers.
trans-unit.target: 指定测试号码范围的末端。

trans-unit.source: Specify the explicit make program to be used by CMake when configuring and building the project. Only applicable for Make and Ninja based generators.
trans-unit.target: 指定 CMake 在配置和构建项目时要使用的显式 make 程序.只适用于基于Make和Ninja的生成器。

trans-unit.source: Specify the files the command is expected to produce but whose modification time may or may not be newer than the dependencies. If a byproduct name is a relative path it will be interpreted relative to the build tree directory corresponding to the current source directory. Each byproduct file will be marked with the GENERATED source file property automatically.
trans-unit.target: 指定命令应生成的文件，但其修改时间可能比依赖关系新，也可能不新。如果副产品名称是相对路径，则它将相对于与当前源目录相对应的构建树目录进行解释。每个副产品文件将自动标记为 GENERATED 源文件属性。

trans-unit.source: Specify the files the command is expected to produce but whose modification time may or may not be updated on subsequent builds. If a byproduct name is a relative path it will be interpreted relative to the build tree directory corresponding to the current source directory. Each byproduct file will be marked with the GENERATED source file property automatically.
trans-unit.target: 指定该命令应生成的文件，但其修改时间可能会或可能不会在后续版本中更新。如果副产品名称是相对路径，则它将相对于与当前源目录相对应的构建树目录进行解释。每个副产品文件将自动标记为 GENERATED 源文件属性。

trans-unit.source: Specify the format of the archive to be created. Supported formats are: 7zip, gnutar, pax, paxr (restricted pax, default), and zip.
trans-unit.target: 指定要创建的归档的格式。支持的格式为： 7zip ， gnutar ， pax ， paxr （受限的pax，默认）和 zip 。

trans-unit.source: Specify the full path to the gcov command on the machine. Default is the value of CTEST_COVERAGE_COMMAND.
trans-unit.target: 在机器上指定 gcov 命令的完整路径。默认值为 CTEST_COVERAGE_COMMAND 的值。

trans-unit.source: Specify the generator to use. See the cmake-generators(7) manual.
trans-unit.target: 指定要使用的生成器。请参见 cmake-generators(7) 手册。

trans-unit.source: Specify the generator-specific platform.
trans-unit.target: 指定发电机专用平台。

trans-unit.source: Specify the generator-specific toolset.
trans-unit.target: 指定生成器专用工具集。

trans-unit.source: Specify the host tools architecture as x64 or x86. Supported by VS 2013 and above. See the CMAKE_VS_PLATFORM_TOOLSET_HOST_ARCHITECTURE variable.
trans-unit.target: 将主机工具体系结构指定为 x64 或 x86 。受VS 2013及更高版本支持。请参阅 CMAKE_VS_PLATFORM_TOOLSET_HOST_ARCHITECTURE 变量。

trans-unit.source: Specify the link library name for an importedInterface Library.
trans-unit.target: 指定导入的接口库的链接库名称。

trans-unit.source: Specify the location of the .tar file to be created for later upload to CDash. Relative paths will be interpreted with respect to the top-level build directory.
trans-unit.target: 指定要创建的 .tar 文件的位置，以便以后上传到CDash。相对路径将相对于顶级构建目录进行解释。

trans-unit.source: Specify the location or name of the macOS platform SDK to be used. CMake uses this value to compute the value of the -isysroot flag or equivalent and to help the find_* commands locate files in the SDK.
trans-unit.target: 指定要使用的macOS平台SDK的位置或名称。CMake使用此值来计算 -isysroot 标志或等效标志的值，并帮助 find_* 命令在SDK中查找文件。

trans-unit.source: Specify the minimum version of macOS on which the target binaries are to be deployed.
trans-unit.target: 指定要部署目标二进制文件的 macOS 的最低版本。

trans-unit.source: Specify the minimum version of the target platform (e.g. macOS or iOS) on which the target binaries are to be deployed. CMake uses this variable value for the -mmacosx-version-min flag or their respective target platform equivalents. For older Xcode versions that shipped multiple macOS SDKs this variable also helps to choose the SDK in case CMAKE_OSX_SYSROOT is unset.
trans-unit.target: 指定要在其上部署目标二进制文件的目标平台的最低版本（例如macOS或iOS）。CMake将此变量值用于 -mmacosx-version-min 标志或它们各自的目标平台等效项。对于附带多个macOS SDK的旧Xcode版本，如果 CMAKE_OSX_SYSROOT 设置CMAKE_OSX_SYSROOT，则此变量还有助于选择SDK 。

trans-unit.source: Specify the name of a target to build. If not specified the CTEST_BUILD_TARGET variable will be checked. Otherwise the default target will be built. This is the "all" target (called ALL_BUILD in Visual Studio Generators).

Specify the name of a target to build. If not specified the CTEST_BUILD_TARGET variable will be checked. Otherwise the default target will be built. This is the “all” target (called ALL_BUILD in Visual Studio Generators).
trans-unit.target: 指定要构建的目标的名称。如果未指定，将检查 CTEST_BUILD_TARGET 变量。否则，将建立默认目标。这是“全部”目标（在Visual Studio Generators中称为 ALL_BUILD ）。

trans-unit.source: Specify the name of a variable that holds the version of the package that has been found. This version will be checked against the (potentially) specified required version given to the find_package() call, including its EXACT option. The default messages include information about the required version and the version which has been actually found, both if the version is ok or not.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个变量名称，该变量包含已找到的软件包的版本。该版本将根据给 find_package() 调用提供的（可能）指定的必需版本（包括其 EXACT 选项）进行检查。默认消息包括有关所需版本和实际找到的版本的信息，无论版本是否正常。

trans-unit.source: Specify the name of a variable that holds the version of the package that has been found. This version will be checked against the (potentially) specified required version given to the find_package() call, including its EXACT option. The default messages include information about the required version and the version which has been actually found, both if the version is ok or not.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个变量名称，该变量包含已找到的软件包的版本。将根据给 find_package() 调用提供的（可能）指定的必需版本（包括其 EXACT 选项）来检查该版本。默认消息包括有关所需版本和实际找到的版本的信息（无论版本是否正常）。

trans-unit.source: Specify the name of the project to build.
trans-unit.target: 指定要建立的项目名称。

trans-unit.source: Specify the newline style for the generated file. Specify UNIX or LF for \n newlines, or specify DOS, WIN32, or CRLF for \r\n newlines.
Specify the newline style for the output file. Specify UNIX or LF for \n newlines, or specify DOS, WIN32, or CRLF for \r\n newlines.
trans-unit.target: 指定输出文件的换行样式。为 \n 换行符指定 UNIX 或 LF ，或者为 \r\n 换行符指定 DOS ， WIN32 或 CRLF 。

trans-unit.source: Specify the newline style for the output file. Specify UNIX or LF for \n newlines, or specify DOS, WIN32, or CRLF for \r\n newlines. This option may not be used with COPYONLY.
trans-unit.target: 指定输出文件的换行样式。为 \n 换行符指定 UNIX 或 LF ，或为 \r\n 换行符指定 DOS ， WIN32 或 CRLF 。 COPYONLY 不能使用此选项。

trans-unit.source: Specify the number of tests for CTest to run in parallel. See ctest(1) for more information on parallel test execution.
trans-unit.target: 指定要并行运行的CTest的测试数量。有关并行测试执行的更多信息，请参见 ctest(1) 。

trans-unit.source: Specify the output file name to generate. A relative path is treated with respect to the value of CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR. <output-file> does not support generator expressions.
trans-unit.target: 指定要生成的输出文件名。相对路径相对于 CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR 的值进行处理。 <output-file> 不支持生成器表达式。

trans-unit.source: Specify the output file name to generate. Use generator expressions such as $<CONFIG> to specify a configuration-specific output file name. Multiple configurations may generate the same output file only if the generated content is identical. Otherwise, the <output-file> must evaluate to an unique name for each configuration.

Specify the output file name to generate. Use generator expressions such as $<CONFIG> to specify a configuration-specific output file name. Multiple configurations may generate the same output file only if the generated content is identical. Otherwise, the <output-file> must evaluate to an unique name for each configuration. A relative path (after evaluating generator expressions) is treated with respect to the value of CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR. See policy CMP0070.
trans-unit.target: 指定要生成的输出文件名。使用生成器表达式，例如 $<CONFIG> 来指定特定于配置的输出文件名。仅当生成的内容相同时，多种配置才可以生成相同的输出文件。否则，对于每个配置， <output-file> 必须评估为唯一的名称。相对路径（在评估生成器表达式之后）相对于 CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR 的值。请参阅策略 CMP0070 。

trans-unit.source: Specify the output files the command is expected to produce. If an output name is a relative path it will be interpreted relative to the build tree directory corresponding to the current source directory. Each output file will be marked with the GENERATED source file property automatically. If the output of the custom command is not actually created as a file on disk it should be marked with the SYMBOLIC source file property.
trans-unit.target: 指定命令期望产生的输出文件。如果输出名称是相对路径，则它将相对于与当前源目录相对应的构建树目录进行解释。每个输出文件将自动带有 GENERATED 源文件属性标记。如果自定义命令的输出实际上未作为磁盘上的文件创建，则应将其标记为 SYMBOLIC 源文件属性。

trans-unit.source: Specify the output files the command is expected to produce. If an output name is a relative path it will be interpreted relative to the build tree directory corresponding to the current source directory. Each output file will be marked with the GENERATED source file property automatically. If the output of the custom command is not actually created as a file on disk it should be marked with the SYMBOLIC source file property.
trans-unit.target: 指定命令期望产生的输出文件。如果输出名称是相对路径，则它将相对于与当前源目录相对应的构建树目录进行解释。每个输出文件将自动带有 GENERATED 源文件属性标记。如果自定义命令的输出实际上不是作为磁盘上的文件创建的，则应使用 SYMBOLIC 源文件属性进行标记。

trans-unit.source: Specify the path to the HDF5 installation to use.
trans-unit.target: 指定要使用的HDF5安装路径。

trans-unit.source: Specify the primary input source file to the command. This is treated just like any value given to the DEPENDS option but also suggests to Visual Studio generators where to hang the custom command. Each source file may have at most one command specifying it as its main dependency. A compile command (i.e. for a library or an executable) counts as an implicit main dependency which gets silently overwritten by a custom command specification.
trans-unit.target: 指定命令的主要输入源文件。就像给 DEPENDS 选项提供的任何值一样对待它，但也建议Visual Studio生成器将自定义命令挂在哪里。每个源文件最多可以有一个命令将其指定为其主要依赖项。编译命令（例如，用于库或可执行文件）被视为隐式主依赖关系，该依赖关系被自定义命令规范默默覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Specify the programming language in which a source file is written.

Specify the project configuration to be packaged (e.g. Debug, Release, etc.). When the CMake project uses a multi-configuration generator such as Xcode or Visual Studio, this option is needed to tell cpack which built executables to include in the package.
trans-unit.target: 指定要打包的项目配置（例如 Debug ， Release 等）。当CMake项目使用多配置生成器（例如Xcode或Visual Studio）时，需要使用此选项来告诉 cpack 哪些内置可执行文件包括在包中。

trans-unit.source: Specify the project configuration(s) to be packaged (e.g. Debug, Release, etc.), where <configs> is a semicolon-separated list. When the CMake project uses a multi-configuration generator such as Xcode or Visual Studio, this option is needed to tell cpack which built executables to include in the package. The user is responsible for ensuring that the configuration(s) listed have already been built before invoking cpack.
trans-unit.target: 指定要打包的项目配置（例如 Debug ， Release 等），其中 <configs> 是用分号分隔的列表。当CMake项目使用多配置生成器（例如Xcode或Visual Studio）时，需要使用此选项来告诉 cpack 哪些内置可执行文件包含在软件包中。用户有责任确保在调用 cpack 之前已经构建了列出的配置。

trans-unit.source: Specify the source directory. If not given, the CTEST_SOURCE_DIRECTORY variable is used.
trans-unit.target: 指定源目录。如果未给出，则使用 CTEST_SOURCE_DIRECTORY 变量。

trans-unit.source: Specify the source tree of a third-party utility.
trans-unit.target: 指定第三方实用程序的源树。

trans-unit.source: Specify the stride by which to step across a range of test numbers.
trans-unit.target: 指定跨过测试数字范围的步幅。

trans-unit.source: Specify the target language.
trans-unit.target: 指定目标语言。

trans-unit.source: Specify the test command-line. If <command> specifies an executable target (created by add_executable()) it will automatically be replaced by the location of the executable created at build time.
trans-unit.target: 指定测试命令行。如果 <command> 指定了一个可执行目标（由 add_executable() 创建），它将被在构建时创建的可执行文件的位置自动替换。

trans-unit.source: Specify the toolset version to use. Supported by VS 2017 and above with the specified toolset installed. See the CMAKE_VS_PLATFORM_TOOLSET_VERSION variable.
trans-unit.target: 指定要使用的工具集版本。已安装指定工具集的VS 2017及更高版本支持。请参阅 CMAKE_VS_PLATFORM_TOOLSET_VERSION 变量。

trans-unit.source: Specify the top-level build directory for the build. Default is the value of CTEST_BINARY_DIRECTORY.
trans-unit.target: 指定构建的顶级构建目录。默认值为 CTEST_BINARY_DIRECTORY 。

trans-unit.source: Specify the top-level build directory. If not given, the CTEST_BINARY_DIRECTORY variable is used.
trans-unit.target: 指定顶层构建目录。如果未给出，则使用 CTEST_BINARY_DIRECTORY 变量。

trans-unit.source: Specify the top-level source directory for the build. Default is the value of CTEST_SOURCE_DIRECTORY.
trans-unit.target: 指定构建的顶级源目录。默认值为 CTEST_SOURCE_DIRECTORY 。

trans-unit.source: Specify the track to submit dashboard to
trans-unit.target: 指定要提交仪表盘的轨迹。

trans-unit.source: Specify the type of memory checking to perform.
trans-unit.target: 指定要执行的内存检查类型。

trans-unit.source: Specify the variables which are required for this package. These may be named in the generated failure message asking the user to set the missing variable values. Therefore these should typically be cache entries such as FOO_LIBRARY and not output variables like FOO_LIBRARIES.
trans-unit.target: 指定此程序包所需的变量。这些可以在生成的失败消息中被命名，要求用户设置缺少的变量值。因此，它们通常应该是诸如 FOO_LIBRARY 之类的缓存条目，而不是诸如 FOO_LIBRARIES 之类的输出变量。

trans-unit.source: Specify the variables which are required for this package. These may be named in the generated failure message asking the user to set the missing variable values. Therefore these should typically be cache entries such as FOO_LIBRARY and not output variables like FOO_LIBRARIES. This option is mandatory if HANDLE_COMPONENTS is not specified.
trans-unit.target: 指定此程序包所需的变量。这些可能会在生成的失败消息中被命名，要求用户设置缺少的变量值。因此，它们通常应该是诸如 FOO_LIBRARY 之类的缓存条目，而不是诸如 FOO_LIBRARIES 之类的输出变量。如果未指定 HANDLE_COMPONENTS ,则此选项是必需的。

trans-unit.source: Specify the version-control command-line tool to use without detecting the VCS that manages the source tree.
trans-unit.target: 指定要使用的版本控制命令行工具,而不用检测管理源树的VCS。

trans-unit.source: Starting in CMake 3.20, CMake prefers all source files to have their extensions explicitly listed:

Starting with CMake 2.8.4, if a cmake-module shipped with CMake (i.e. located in the CMake module directory) calls include() or find_package(), the files located in the CMake module directory are preferred over the files in CMAKE_MODULE_PATH. This makes sure that the modules belonging to CMake always get those files included which they expect, and against which they were developed and tested. In all other cases, the files found in CMAKE_MODULE_PATH still take precedence over the ones in the CMake module directory. The OLD behavior is to always prefer files from CMAKE_MODULE_PATH over files from the CMake modules directory.
trans-unit.target: 从CMake 2.8.4开始，如果CMake随附的cmake模块（即位于CMake模块目录中）调用 include() 或 find_package() ，则比 CMAKE_MODULE_PATH 中的文件更优选位于CMake模块目录中的文件。这样可以确保属于CMake的模块始终获得期望的文件，并针对这些文件进行开发和测试。在所有其他情况下，在 CMAKE_MODULE_PATH 中找到的文件仍然优先于CMake模块目录中的文件。较 OLD 行为是总是比CMake modules目录中的文件更喜欢CMAKE_MODULE_PATH中的文件。

trans-unit.source: Starting with CMake 3.13, UseSWIG generates now standard target names. This policy provides compatibility with projects that expect the legacy behavior.
trans-unit.target: 从CMake 3.13开始， UseSWIG 现在会生成标准目标名称。此策略提供与预期旧行为的项目的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: Starting with CMake 3.14, UseSWIG passes option -module <module_name> to SWIG compiler if the file property SWIG_MODULE_NAME is specified. This policy provides compatibility with projects that expect the legacy behavior.
trans-unit.target: 从CMake 3.14开始，如果指定了文件属性 SWIG_MODULE_NAME ，则 UseSWIG 将选项 -module <module_name> 传递给 SWIG 编译器。此策略提供与预期旧行为的项目的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: Starting with CMake 3.15, Modules FindPython3, FindPython2 and FindPython set value LOCATION for, respectively, variables Python3_FIND_STRATEGY, Python2_FIND_STRATEGY and Python_FIND_STRATEGY. This policy provides compatibility with projects that expect the legacy behavior.
trans-unit.target: 从CMake 3.15开始，模块 FindPython3 ， FindPython2 和 FindPython 分别为变量 Python3_FIND_STRATEGY ， Python2_FIND_STRATEGY 和 Python_FIND_STRATEGY 设置值 LOCATION 。此策略提供与预期旧行为的项目的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: Starting with CMake 3.20 the GENERATED source file property can be set and retrieved from any directory scope. It is an all-or-nothing property. It also can no longer be removed or unset if it was set to TRUE. Policy CMP0118 was introduced to allow supporting the OLD behavior for some time.

Starting with CMake 3.20, the DEPFILE argument is relative to CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR (unless it is absolute), and the paths in the DEPFILE are also relative to CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR. CMake automatically transforms the paths in the DEPFILE (unless they are absolute) after the custom command is run. The file listed in DEPFILE is not modified in any way. Instead, CMake writes the transformation to its own internal file, and passes this internal file to Ninja's depfile variable. This transformation happens regardless of whether or not DEPFILE is relative, and regardless of whether or not add_custom_command() is called from a subdirectory.

trans-unit.source: Step targets always depend on targets named by the ExternalProject_Add()DEPENDS option even though not all steps need them. In order to allow step targets to be created without those dependencies, the ExternalProject_Add()INDEPENDENT_STEP_TARGETS option or the ExternalProject_Add_StepTargets()NO_DEPENDS option may be used. However, adding such "independent" step targets makes sense only for specific steps such as download, update, and patch because they do not need any of the external project's build dependencies. Furthermore, it does not make sense to create independent step targets for steps that depend on non-independent steps. Such rules are not enforced, and projects that do not follow them can generate build systems with confusing and generator-specific behavior.

Step targets always depend on targets named by the ExternalProject_Add()DEPENDS option even though not all steps need them. In order to allow step targets to be created without those dependencies, the ExternalProject_Add()INDEPENDENT_STEP_TARGETS option or the ExternalProject_Add_StepTargets()NO_DEPENDS option may be used. However, adding such “independent” step targets makes sense only for specific steps such as download, update, and patch because they do not need any of the external project’s build dependencies. Furthermore, it does not make sense to create independent step targets for steps that depend on non-independent steps. Such rules are not enforced, and projects that do not follow them can generate build systems with confusing and generator-specific behavior.
trans-unit.target: 步骤目标始终依赖于由 ExternalProject_Add() DEPENDS 选项命名的目标，即使并非所有步骤都需要它们。为了允许创建没有这些依赖关系的步骤目标，可以使用 ExternalProject_Add() INDEPENDENT_STEP_TARGETS 选项或 ExternalProject_Add_StepTargets() NO_DEPENDS 选项。但是，添加此类“独立”步骤目标仅对特定步骤有意义，例如 download ， update 和 patch 因为它们不需要任何外部项目的构建依赖项。此外，为依赖于非独立步骤的步骤创建独立步骤目标没有意义。此类规则不会强制执行，不遵循这些规则的项目可能会生成具有混乱且特定于生成器的行为的构建系统。

trans-unit.source: Step targets created by the ExternalProject_Add()STEP_TARGETS option or the ExternalProject_Add_Step() function are now independent if and only if their steps are marked as independent. The ExternalProject_Add()INDEPENDENT_STEP_TARGETS option and ExternalProject_Add_StepTargets()NO_DEPENDS option are no longer allowed.
trans-unit.target: 现在，仅当且仅当将其标记为独立时，由 ExternalProject_Add() STEP_TARGETS 选项或 ExternalProject_Add_Step() 函数创建的步骤目标才是独立的。不再允许使用 ExternalProject_Add() INDEPENDENT_STEP_TARGETS 选项和 ExternalProject_Add_StepTargets() NO_DEPENDS 选项。

trans-unit.source: Step targets hold copies of the custom commands implementing their steps that are separate from the copies in the primary target created by ExternalProject_Add(), and the primary target does not depend on the step targets. In parallel builds that drive the primary target and step targets concurrently, multiple copies of the steps’ commands may run concurrently and race each other.
trans-unit.target: 步骤目标保存执行其步骤的自定义命令的副本，这些副本与 ExternalProject_Add() 创建的主要目标中的副本分开，并且主要目标不依赖于步骤目标。在并行驱动主要目标和步骤目标的并行构建中，步骤命令的多个副本可以同时运行并相互竞争。

trans-unit.source: Step targets hold copies of the custom commands implementing their steps that are separate from the copies in the primary target created by ExternalProject_Add(), and the primary target does not depend on the step targets. In parallel builds that drive the primary target and step targets concurrently, multiple copies of the steps' commands may run concurrently and race each other.

Step targets, when created, are fully responsible for holding the custom commands implementing their steps. The primary target created by ExternalProject_Add() depends on the step targets, and the step targets depend on each other. The target-level dependencies match the file-level dependencies used by the custom commands for each step.
trans-unit.target: 步骤目标创建后，将完全负责保存实现其步骤的自定义命令。由 ExternalProject_Add() 创建的主要目标取决于步骤目标，并且步骤目标彼此依赖。目标级别的依存关系与自定义命令在每个步骤中使用的文件级别的依存关系相匹配。

trans-unit.source: Store the current build directory in the CMake user package registry for package <PackageName>. The find_package() command may consider the directory while searching for package <PackageName>. This helps dependent projects find and use a package from the current project’s build tree without help from the user. Note that the entry in the package registry that this command creates works only in conjunction with a package configuration file (<PackageName>Config.cmake) that works with the build tree. In some cases, for example for packaging and for system wide installations, it is not desirable to write the user package registry.
trans-unit.target: 将当前构建目录存储在CMake用户软件包注册表中，以用于软件包 <PackageName> 。所述 find_package() ，同时搜索包命令可以考虑目录 <PackageName> 。这可以帮助从属项目从当前项目的构建树中查找和使用软件包，而无需用户的帮助。请注意，此命令在程序包注册表中创建的条目仅与与构建树一起使用的程序包配置文件（ <PackageName>Config.cmake ）结合使用。在某些情况下，例如对于包装和系统范围的安装，不希望编写用户软件包注册表。

trans-unit.source: Store the current build directory in the CMake user package registry for package <PackageName>. The find_package() command may consider the directory while searching for package <PackageName>. This helps dependent projects find and use a package from the current project's build tree without help from the user. Note that the entry in the package registry that this command creates works only in conjunction with a package configuration file (<PackageName>Config.cmake) that works with the build tree. In some cases, for example for packaging and for system wide installations, it is not desirable to write the user package registry.

trans-unit.source: Store the resulting status of the operation in a variable. The status is a ; separated list of length 2. The first element is the numeric return value for the operation, and the second element is a string value for the error. A 0 numeric error means no error in the operation.
trans-unit.target: 将操作的结果状态存储在变量中。状态为 ; 分隔的长度为2的列表。第一个元素是操作的数字返回值，第二个元素是错误的字符串值。甲 0 数字错误意味着在操作没有错误。

trans-unit.source: Such an interface depends on using the correct preprocessor defines for the compiler features. CMake can generate a header file containing such defines using the WriteCompilerDetectionHeader module. The module contains the write_compiler_detection_header function which accepts parameters to control the content of the generated header file:
trans-unit.target: 这样的接口取决于为编译器功能使用正确的预处理器定义。CMake可以使用 WriteCompilerDetectionHeader 模块生成包含此类定义的头文件。该模块包含 write_compiler_detection_header 函数，该函数接受参数来控制所生成的头文件的内容：

trans-unit.source: Such compile flags are added even if the compiler supports the particular feature without the flag. For example, the GNU compiler supports variadic templates (with a warning) even if -std=gnu++98 is used. CMake adds the -std=gnu++11 flag if cxx_variadic_templates is specified as a requirement.
trans-unit.target: 即使编译器支持不带标志的特定功能，也会添加此类编译标志。例如，即使使用 -std=gnu++98 ，GNU编译器也支持可变参数模板（带有警告）。如果将 cxx_variadic_templates 指定为要求，则CMake将添加 -std=gnu++11 标志。
